▁Acha ▁ya let we ▁maji ▁kidogo , ▁kisha ▁ninyi ▁nyo te ▁mna we ▁miguu ▁yenu ▁na ▁mp um z ike ▁chini ▁ya ▁mti ▁huu . </s> swh_Latn

▁Kwa ▁hiyo ▁Yakobo ▁akat umika ▁miaka ▁saba ▁ili ▁kum pata ▁Ra heli , ▁lakini ▁ili onekana ▁kwake ▁kama ▁siku ▁chache ▁tu ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁ya ▁upendo ▁wake ▁kwa ▁Ra heli . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ndipo ▁Yakobo ▁akam wambia ▁Lab ani , ▁" Ni pe ▁mke ▁wangu . ▁Muda ▁wangu ▁um ek ami lika , ▁nami ▁nataka ▁nik ut ane ▁naye ▁kimwili . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Basi ▁Lab ani ▁aka ali ka ▁watu ▁wote ▁wa ▁mahali ▁pale ▁na ▁aka fanya ▁kar amu . </s> swh_Latn

▁Kes ho ▁yake ▁asubuhi , ▁Yakobo ▁akag undua ▁kuwa ▁ame pewa ▁Lea ! ▁Basi ▁Yakobo ▁akam wambia ▁Lab ani , ▁" Ni ▁jambo ▁gani ▁hili ▁u lil onit ende a ? ▁Ni lik utum ikia ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁Ra heli , ▁si vyo ? ▁Kwa ▁nini ▁um en idang anya ?" </s> swh_Latn
▁Lab ani ▁aka jibu , ▁" Si ▁dest uri ▁yetu ▁kum wo za ▁binti ▁mdogo ▁kabla ▁ya ▁kum wo za ▁binti ▁mkubwa . </s> swh_Latn

▁Haya ▁ndiyo ▁majina ▁ya ▁wana ▁wa ▁Esau : ▁Eli fazi , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Esau ▁ambaye ▁mke we ▁Ada ▁alim za lia ; ▁na ▁Re ueli , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Esau ▁ambaye ▁mke we ▁Bas em athi ▁alim za lia . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wana ▁wa ▁Eli fazi ▁ni : ▁Tem ani , ▁Om ari , ▁Se fo , ▁Gat amu ▁na ▁Kena zi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Eli fazi ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Esau ▁alikuwa ▁pia ▁na ▁sur ia ▁aliye itwa ▁Tim na , ▁ambaye ▁alim za lia ▁Ama leki . ▁Hawa ▁ndio ▁waliokuwa ▁waj ukuu ▁wa ▁Ada ▁mke ▁wa ▁Esau . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wana ▁wa ▁Re ueli ▁ni : ▁Na hathi , ▁Z era , ▁Sh ama ▁na ▁Mi za . ▁Hawa ▁ndio ▁waliokuwa ▁waj ukuu ▁wa ▁Bas em athi ▁mke we ▁Esau . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wana ▁wa ▁Oho lib ama ▁binti ▁Ana , ▁mke we ▁Esau , ▁aliyekuwa ▁mj ukuu ▁wa ▁Si be oni , ▁ali om za lia ▁Esau ▁ni : ▁Ye ushi , ▁Ya lamu ▁na ▁Kora . </s> swh_Latn
▁Hawa ▁ndio ▁waliokuwa ▁waku u ▁miongoni ▁mwa ▁wa zao ▁wa ▁Esau : ▁Waku u ▁wa ▁wana ▁wa ▁Eli fazi , ▁m zaliwa ▁wa ▁kwanza ▁wa ▁Esau ▁ni : ▁Tem ani , ▁Om ari , ▁Se fo , ▁Kena zi , </s> swh_Latn
▁Kora , ▁Gat amu ▁na ▁Ama leki . ▁Hawa ▁ndio ▁waliokuwa ▁waku u ▁wali otoka ▁kwa ▁Eli fazi ▁huko ▁Ed omu , ▁waliokuwa ▁waj ukuu ▁wa ▁ki ume ▁wa ▁Ada . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waku u ▁wa ▁wana ▁wa ▁Re ueli , ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Esau ▁ni : ▁Na hathi , ▁Z era , ▁Sh ama ▁na ▁Mi za . ▁Hawa ▁ndio ▁waku u ▁wali otoka ▁kwa ▁Re ueli ▁huko ▁Ed omu , ▁waliokuwa ▁waj ukuu ▁wa ▁ki ume ▁wa ▁Bas em athi ▁mke we ▁Esau . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waku u ▁wa ▁wana ▁wa ▁Esau ▁ambao ▁mke we ▁Oho lib ama ▁alim za lia ▁ni : ▁Ye ushi , ▁Ya lamu ▁na ▁Kora . ▁Hawa ▁ndio ▁waku u ▁wali otoka ▁kwa ▁mke ▁wa ▁Esau , ▁Oho lib ama ▁binti ▁Ana . </s> swh_Latn
▁Hawa ▁ndio ▁waliokuwa ▁wana ▁wa ▁Esau ▁( ndi ye ▁Ed omu ), ▁na ▁hawa ▁ndio ▁waliokuwa ▁waku u ▁wao . </s> swh_Latn
▁Hawa ▁ndio ▁walikuwa ▁wana ▁wa ▁Se iri , ▁Mh ori , ▁waliokuwa ▁waki ishi ▁katika ▁nchi ▁ile : ▁Lot ani , ▁Sho bali , ▁Si be oni , ▁Ana , </s> swh_Latn
▁D ishoni , ▁Es eri ▁na ▁D ishani . ▁Hawa ▁ndio ▁wana ▁wa ▁Se iri ▁huko ▁Ed omu ▁waliokuwa ▁waku u ▁kwa ▁Wah ori . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wana ▁wa ▁Lot ani ▁walikuwa : ▁Hori ▁na ▁Hom amu . ▁Tim na ▁alikuwa ▁dada ▁yake ▁Lot ani . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wana ▁wa ▁Sho bali ▁walikuwa : ▁Al vani , ▁Mana hathi , ▁E bali , ▁She fo ▁na ▁On amu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wana ▁wa ▁Si be oni ▁walikuwa : ▁Ai ya ▁na ▁Ana . ▁Hu yu ▁Ana ▁ndiye ▁alig undua ▁chem ch emi ▁ya ▁maji ▁moto ▁jang wani ▁alipokuwa ▁ak ich unga ▁punda ▁za ▁Si be oni ▁baba ▁yake . </s> swh_Latn
▁Watoto ▁wa ▁Ana ▁walikuwa : ▁D ishoni ▁na ▁Oho lib ama ▁binti ▁wa ▁Ana . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wana ▁wa ▁D ishoni ▁walikuwa : ▁Hem d ani , ▁Esh bani , ▁Ith rani ▁na ▁Ker ani . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wana ▁wa ▁Es eri ▁walikuwa : ▁Bil hani , ▁Z aa vani ▁na ▁Ak ani . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wana ▁wa ▁D ishani ▁walikuwa : ▁Usi ▁na ▁Ar ani . </s> swh_Latn
▁Hawa ▁ndio ▁waliokuwa ▁waku u ▁wa ▁Wah ori : ▁Lot ani , ▁Sho bali , ▁Si be oni , ▁Ana , </s> swh_Latn
▁D ishoni , ▁Es eri ▁na ▁D ishani . ▁Hawa ▁ndio ▁walikuwa ▁waku u ▁wa ▁Wah ori , ▁kufu atana ▁na ▁mak undi ▁yao , ▁katika ▁nchi ▁ya ▁Se iri . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wa fuata o ▁ni ▁wa falme ▁walio ta wala ▁Ed omu ▁kabla ▁ya ▁mfalme ▁yeyote ▁wa ▁Israeli ▁kuta wala : </s> swh_Latn
▁Bela ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Be ori ▁alikuwa ▁mfalme ▁wa ▁Ed omu . ▁M ji ▁wake ▁uli itwa ▁Din haba . </s> swh_Latn
▁Bela ▁alipo far iki , ▁Yo babu ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Z era ▁kutoka ▁Bos ra ▁akawa ▁mfalme ▁baada ▁yake . </s> swh_Latn
▁Yo babu ▁alipo far iki , ▁H ush amu ▁kutoka ▁nchi ▁ya ▁Wat emani ▁akawa ▁mfalme ▁baada ▁yake . </s> swh_Latn
▁H ush amu ▁alipo far iki , ▁Had adi ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Bed adi , ▁ali yes hinda ▁Midi ani ▁katika ▁nchi ▁ya ▁Mo abu , ▁akawa ▁mfalme ▁baada ▁yake . ▁M ji ▁wake ▁uli itwa ▁A vit hi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Had adi ▁alipo far iki , ▁Sam la ▁kutoka ▁Mas reka ▁akawa ▁mfalme ▁baada ▁yake . </s> swh_Latn
▁Sam la ▁alipo far iki , ▁Sha uli ▁kutoka ▁Re hob othi ▁ng ʼ ambo ▁ya ▁M to ▁Fr ati ▁akawa ▁mfalme ▁baada ▁yake . </s> swh_Latn
▁Sha uli ▁alipo far iki , ▁Baal - Han ani ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Ak b ori ▁akawa ▁mfalme ▁baada ▁yake . </s> swh_Latn
▁Baal - Han ani ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Ak b ori ▁alipo far iki , ▁Had adi ▁akawa ▁mfalme ▁baada ▁yake . ▁M ji ▁wake ▁uli itwa ▁Pau , ▁na ▁mke we ▁ali itwa ▁Meh eta beli ▁binti ▁Mat redi , ▁binti ▁Me - Za habu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Hawa ▁ndio ▁waku u ▁wali ot okana ▁na ▁Esau , ▁kwa ▁majina , ▁kufu atana ▁na ▁koo ▁zao ▁na ▁nchi ▁zao : ▁Tim na , ▁Al va , ▁Yet hethi , </s> swh_Latn
▁Oho lib ama , ▁Ela , ▁Pin oni , </s> swh_Latn
▁Kena zi , ▁Tem ani , ▁Mib s ari , </s> swh_Latn
▁Mag die li ▁na ▁Ir amu . ▁Hawa ▁ndio ▁walikuwa ▁waku u ▁wa ▁Ed omu , ▁kufu atana ▁na ▁maka zi ▁yao ▁katika ▁nchi ▁wali yo im iliki . ▁Hu yu ▁ndiye ▁alikuwa ▁Esau , ▁baba ▁wa ▁Wa ed omu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Yakobo ▁aka ishi ▁Kana ani ▁katika ▁nchi ▁ambayo ▁baba ▁yake ▁alikuwa ▁ame ishi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Zi fuata zo ▁ni ▁habari ▁za ▁Yakobo . ▁Yosefu , ▁kijana ▁wa ▁miaka ▁kumi ▁na ▁saba , ▁alikuwa ▁ak ich unga ▁mak undi ▁ya ▁kondo o ▁na ▁mbu zi ▁pamoja ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁wa ▁mama ▁wengine , ▁yaani ▁wana ▁wa ▁Bil ha ▁na ▁wana ▁wa ▁Z il pa ▁wake ▁za ▁baba ▁yake , ▁naye ▁akawa ▁akim le tea ▁baba ▁yake ▁taarifa ▁mbaya ▁kuhusu ▁hao ▁ndugu ▁zake . </s> swh_Latn
▁Basi , ▁Israeli ▁ak amp enda ▁Yosefu ▁kuliko ▁yeyote ▁miongoni ▁mwa ▁kaka ▁zake , ▁kwani ▁ni ▁mwana we ▁wa ▁uze eni , ▁akam sh onea ▁jo ho ▁lilil or embwa ▁vizuri ▁sana . </s> swh_Latn
▁Nd ugu ▁zake ▁wali po ona ▁kwamba ▁baba ▁yao ▁an amp enda ▁Yosefu ▁kuliko ▁yeyote ▁mwingine ▁miongoni ▁mwa o , ▁walim ch ukia ▁na ▁hawak us ema ▁naye ▁neno ▁lolote ▁jema . </s> swh_Latn
▁Yosefu ▁aka ota ▁ndoto , ▁naye ▁alipo wa eleza ▁ndugu ▁zake , ▁wakam ch ukia ▁zaidi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Aka wa ambia , ▁" S iki liz eni ▁ndoto ▁nili yoota : </s> swh_Latn
▁Tuli kuwa ▁tuk if unga ▁mig anda ▁ya ▁naf aka ▁sh ambani , ▁gha fula ▁m ganda ▁wangu ▁uk asim ama ▁w ima , ▁wakati ▁mig anda ▁yenu ▁iki uz unguka ▁na ▁kuu inam ia . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Nd ugu ▁zake ▁wakam wambia , ▁" We we ▁un akus udia ▁kutu ta wala ? ▁Hivi ▁kweli ▁wewe ▁ut atuta wala ▁sisi ?" ▁Waka ongeza ▁kum ch ukia ▁zaidi ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁ya ▁ndoto ▁yake ▁pamoja ▁na ▁yale ▁ali yowa ambia . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kisha ▁aka ota ▁ndoto ▁nyingine , ▁akawa ambia ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁ak isema , ▁" S iki liz eni , ▁nime ota ▁ndoto ▁nyingine , ▁wakati ▁huu ▁jua , ▁mwezi ▁na ▁nyota ▁kumi ▁na ▁moja ▁zili kuwa ▁z inan is uj udia . " </s> swh_Latn
▁A lip om wambia ▁baba ▁yake ▁pamoja ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zake , ▁baba ▁yake ▁akam k emea ▁ak isema , ▁" Ni ▁ndoto ▁gani ▁hii ▁uli yoota ? ▁Hivi ▁kweli ▁mama ▁yako ▁na ▁mimi ▁na ▁ndugu ▁zako ▁tut akuja ▁kuk usu jud ia ▁wewe ▁hadi ▁nchi ?" </s> swh_Latn
▁Nd ugu ▁zake ▁wakam wone a ▁w ivu , ▁lakini ▁baba ▁yake ▁aka liw eka ▁jambo ▁hilo ▁moyoni . </s> swh_Latn
▁Basi , ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁walikuwa ▁wamek wenda ▁kuch unga ▁mak undi ▁ya ▁baba ▁yao ▁karibu ▁na ▁Shek emu , </s> swh_Latn
▁naye ▁Israeli ▁akam wambia ▁Yosefu , ▁" K ama ▁uj ua vyo , ▁ndugu ▁zako ▁wana ch unga ▁mak undi ▁huko ▁karibu ▁na ▁Shek emu . ▁N joo , ▁nit akut uma ▁kwao . " ▁Yosefu ▁aka jibu , ▁" V ema ▁sana , ▁niko ▁tayari . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁hiyo ▁akam wambia , ▁" N enda ▁u one ▁kama ▁mambo ▁yote ▁ni ▁salama ▁kwa ▁ndugu ▁zako ▁na ▁mak undi , ▁kisha ▁un ile tee ▁habari . " ▁Ndipo ▁ak amt uma ▁Yosefu ▁kutoka ▁B onde ▁la ▁Heb roni . ▁Yosefu ▁alipo fika ▁Shek emu , </s> swh_Latn
▁mtu ▁mmoja ▁akam kuta ▁ak iz unguka zung uka ▁mash ambani ▁na ▁akamu uliza , ▁" Un ata futa ▁nini ?" </s> swh_Latn
▁Aka jibu , ▁" N ina wata futa ▁ndugu ▁zangu . ▁Unaweza ▁kuni ambia ▁wana ch unga ▁wapi ▁mak undi ▁yao ?" </s> swh_Latn
▁Y ule ▁mtu ▁aka jibu , ▁" W am eh ama ▁hapa . ▁N ilis ikia ▁wak isema , ▁' T wende ▁D oth ani .' ▁" ▁Kwa ▁hiyo ▁Yosefu ▁akawa fu atilia ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁na ▁ku waku ta ▁karibu ▁na ▁D oth ani . </s> swh_Latn
▁Nd ugu ▁zake ▁walip om wona ▁akiwa ▁mbali , ▁kabla ▁haja wa fikia , ▁wakap anga ▁sha uri ▁baya ▁la ▁kumu ua . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka ambi ana , ▁" Y ule ▁m wo ta ▁ndoto ▁an akuja ! </s> swh_Latn
▁N jo oni ▁sasa , ▁tumu ue ▁na ▁kum tupa ▁katika ▁shimo ▁moja wapo ▁na ▁tus eme ▁kwamba ▁m nyama ▁m kali ▁am em rar ua . ▁Kisha ▁tuta ona ▁matokeo ▁ya ▁ndoto ▁zake . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Re ub eni ▁ali pos ikia ▁jambo ▁hili , ▁aka jaribu ▁kumw okoa ▁kutoka ▁mik on oni ▁mwa o ▁akasema , ▁" T usi utoe ▁uhai ▁wake . </s> swh_Latn
▁T usim wa ge ▁damu ▁yoyote . ▁M tup eni ▁katika ▁shimo ▁lilil oko ▁hapa ▁jang wani , ▁lakini ▁msim g use . " ▁Re ub eni ▁alisema ▁hivyo ▁ili ▁am woko e ▁kutoka ▁mik on oni ▁mwa o , ▁kisha ▁am rud ishe ▁nyumbani ▁kwa ▁baba ▁yake . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁hiyo ▁Yosefu ▁alipo wa fikia ▁ndugu ▁zake , ▁walim vua ▁lile ▁jo ho ▁lake , ▁lile ▁jo ho ▁lilil or embwa ▁vizuri ▁ali l okuwa ▁ame vaa . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kisha ▁wakam chukua ▁wakam tupa ▁katika ▁shimo . ▁Wakati ▁huo ▁shimo ▁lilikuwa ▁tupu , ▁ha likuwa ▁na ▁maji ▁ndani ▁yake . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wali p okaa ▁ili ▁wale ▁chakula ▁chao , ▁waka in ua ▁macho ▁waka ona ▁msa fara ▁wa ▁Wa ish ma eli ▁uki ja ▁kutoka ▁Gileadi . ▁Ng amia ▁wao ▁walikuwa ▁wame pak izwa ▁miz igo ▁ya ▁v ikole zo , ▁uv umba ▁na ▁man emane , ▁nao ▁walikuwa ▁nji ani ▁kuvi peleka ▁Misri . </s> swh_Latn
▁Yuda ▁akawa ambia ▁ndugu ▁zake , ▁" T uta fa idi ▁nini ▁ikiwa ▁tut amu ua ▁ndugu ▁yetu ▁na ▁kui fi cha ▁damu ▁yake ? </s> swh_Latn
▁N jo oni , ▁tum uu ze ▁kwa ▁hawa ▁Wa ish ma eli . ▁T usim g use , ▁kwa ▁kuwa ▁hata ▁hivyo ▁yeye ▁ni ▁ndugu ▁yetu , ▁nyama ▁yetu ▁na ▁damu ▁yetu ▁wenyewe . " ▁Nd ugu ▁zake ▁wak akubali . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁hiyo ▁wale ▁wa fanya bi ashara ▁Wam idi ani ▁wali po fika ▁pale , ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁wakam toa ▁Yosefu ▁kutoka ▁kwenye ▁lile ▁shimo , ▁na ▁kum uuza ▁kwa ▁sh ekeli ▁is hir ini ▁za ▁fedha ▁kwa ▁wale ▁Wa ish ma eli , ▁ambao ▁walim peleka ▁Misri . </s> swh_Latn
▁Re ub eni ▁ali por udi ▁kuta zama ▁kwenye ▁lile ▁shimo ▁na ▁kuona ▁kwamba ▁Yosefu ▁hay upo , ▁ali rar ua ▁nguo ▁zake . </s> swh_Latn
▁Aka war udia ▁ndugu ▁zake ▁na ▁kusema , ▁" K ij ana ▁hay uko ▁mle ! ▁Nie leke e ▁wapi ▁sasa ?" </s> swh_Latn
▁Kisha ▁waka lich ukua ▁lile ▁jo ho ▁la ▁Yosefu , ▁waka chinja ▁mbu zi ▁na ▁ku lich ov ya ▁katika ▁damu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka lich ukua ▁lile ▁jo ho ▁lilil or embwa ▁vizuri ▁na ▁kuli peleka ▁kwa ▁baba ▁yao ▁na ▁kusema , ▁" T umeli okota ▁hili ▁jo ho . ▁Uch ungu ze ▁u one ▁kama ▁ni ▁la ▁mwana o . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Baba ▁yao ▁aka lit ambua ▁akasema , ▁" H ili ▁ni ▁jo ho ▁la ▁mwan angu ! ▁M nyama ▁m kali ▁am em rar ua . ▁Hakika ▁Yosefu ▁amer ar uliwa ▁vi pande ▁vi pande . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Kisha ▁Yakobo ▁akar arua ▁nguo ▁zake , ▁aka vaa ▁nguo ▁ya ▁gun ia ▁na ▁kumw ombo le zea ▁mwana we ▁kwa ▁siku ▁nyingi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wana we ▁wote ▁na ▁binti ▁zake ▁waka ja ▁kum fari ji , ▁lakini ▁hak uku bali ▁kuf ari jiwa . ▁Ak asema , ▁" H apana , ▁nit am w ombo le zea ▁mwan angu ▁mpaka ▁nim fik ie ▁kabur ini . " ▁Kwa ▁hiyo ▁baba ▁yake ▁aka endelea ▁kum li lia . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wakati ▁ule ▁ule , ▁Wam idi ani ▁wakamu uza ▁Yosefu ▁huko ▁Misri ▁kwa ▁Poti fa , ▁mmoja wapo ▁wa ▁maaf isa ▁wa ▁Farao , ▁aliyekuwa ▁mkuu ▁wa ▁ul inzi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wakati ▁ule , ▁Yuda ▁akawa acha ▁ndugu ▁zake , ▁aka enda ▁kuishi ▁na ▁H ira ▁Mw adu lami . </s> swh_Latn
▁H uko ▁Yuda ▁akak utana ▁na ▁binti ▁wa ▁K ikana ani ▁a itwa ye ▁Sh ua , ▁akam wo a ▁na ▁akak utana ▁naye ▁kimwili , </s> swh_Latn
▁akap ata ▁mimba , ▁akam zaa ▁mwana , ▁ambaye ▁alim wita ▁Eri . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ak apata ▁mimba ▁tena , ▁akam zaa ▁mwana ▁na ▁kum wita ▁Onani . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ak am zaa ▁mwana ▁mwingine ▁tena , ▁akam wita ▁S hela . ▁Hu yu ▁alim za lia ▁mahali ▁pa itwa po ▁Ke zibu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Yuda ▁ak amp atia ▁Eri , ▁m zaliwa ▁wake ▁wa ▁kwanza , ▁mke ▁a itwa ye ▁Tam ari . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁Eri , ▁m zaliwa ▁wa ▁kwanza ▁wa ▁Yuda , ▁alikuwa ▁mw ovu ▁mach oni ▁pa ▁Bwana , ▁kwa ▁hiyo ▁Bwana ▁akamu ua . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kisha ▁Yuda ▁akam wambia ▁Onani , ▁" K utana ▁kimwili ▁na ▁mke ▁wa ▁ndugu ▁yako , ▁na ▁uti mize ▁waji bu ▁wako ▁kwake ▁kama ▁mke ▁wa ▁ndugu ▁yako , ▁ili ▁umpat ie ▁ndugu ▁yako ▁uza o . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁Onani ▁ali jua ▁kwamba ▁uza o ▁ha ung ekuwa ▁wake , ▁kwa ▁hiyo ▁kila ▁ali pok utana ▁kimwili ▁na ▁mke ▁wa ▁ndugu ▁yake , ▁alim waga ▁chini ▁mb egu ▁za ▁ki ume ▁ili ▁as impat ie ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁uza o . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ali cho fanya ▁ki likuwa ▁ki ovu ▁mach oni ▁pa ▁Bwana , ▁hivyo , ▁pia ▁Bwana ▁akamu ua ▁Onani . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kisha ▁Yuda ▁akam wambia ▁Tam ari ▁mk we we , ▁" Is hi ▁kama ▁mj ane ▁nyumbani ▁mwa ▁baba ▁yako ▁mpaka ▁mwan angu ▁S hela ▁at akap okua . " ▁Kwa ▁maana ▁ali fikiri , ▁" A nge weza ▁kufa ▁pia ▁kama ▁ndugu ▁zake . " ▁Kwa ▁hiyo ▁Tam ari ▁alik wenda ▁kuishi ▁nyumbani ▁kwa ▁baba ▁yake . </s> swh_Latn
▁Baada ▁ya ▁muda ▁mrefu ▁mke ▁wa ▁Yuda ▁binti ▁wa ▁Sh ua ▁aka far iki . ▁Baada ▁ya ▁msi ba , ▁Yuda ▁alik wenda ▁Tim na , ▁kwa ▁watu ▁waliokuwa ▁wak ikata ▁kondo o ▁wake ▁man yoya , ▁naye ▁ali fu atana ▁na ▁rafiki ▁yake ▁H ira ▁Mw adu lami . </s> swh_Latn
▁Tam ari ▁alipo ambiwa , ▁" Baba ▁mk we ▁wako ▁yuko ▁nji ani ▁kwenda ▁Tim na ▁kukata ▁kondo o ▁wake ▁man yoya , " </s> swh_Latn
▁ali vua ▁mava zi ▁yake ▁ya ▁uj ane , ▁aka ji funika ▁kwa ▁s hela ▁ili ▁asi faham ike , ▁akak eti ▁kwenye ▁ml ango ▁wa ▁Ena imu , ▁ambao ▁upo ▁nji ani ▁kuelekea ▁Tim na . ▁Aka fanya ▁hivyo ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁ali ona ▁kwamba , ▁ingawa ▁S hela ▁amek ua , ▁lakini ▁alikuwa ▁ha jaka bid hiwa ▁kwake ▁kuwa ▁mke we . </s> swh_Latn
▁Yuda ▁ali pom wona ▁ali fikiri ▁ni ▁kaha ba , ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁alikuwa ▁ame funika ▁uso ▁wake . </s> swh_Latn

▁Basi ▁kijana ▁wa ▁Kieb rania ▁aliyekuwa ▁pamoja ▁nasi ▁huko , ▁alikuwa ▁mtum ishi ▁wa ▁mkuu ▁wa ▁kik osi ▁cha ▁ul inzi . ▁Tu lim wele za ▁ndoto ▁zetu , ▁naye ▁ak atu fas iria , ▁ak itu pa ▁kila ▁mtu ▁tafs iri ▁ya ▁ndoto ▁yake . </s> swh_Latn

▁Basi , ▁Farao ▁akat uma ▁Yosefu ▁ait we , ▁naye ▁ak ato lewa ▁kif ung oni ▁haraka . ▁Baada ▁ya ▁kun yo a ▁na ▁kub ad ilisha ▁nguo ▁zake ▁aka enda ▁mbele ▁ya ▁Farao . </s> swh_Latn

▁Tuli zaliwa ▁ndugu ▁kumi ▁na ▁wawili , ▁wana ▁wa ▁baba ▁mmoja . ▁Mmo ja ▁aliku fa , ▁na ▁mdogo ▁wetu ▁wa ▁mwisho ▁y upo ▁na ▁baba ▁yetu ▁huko ▁Kana ani .' </s> swh_Latn
▁" Ndipo ▁huyo ▁mtu ▁aliye ▁bwana ▁katika ▁nchi ▁hiyo ▁alip otu ambia , ▁' H ivi ▁ndivyo ▁nita fahamu ▁kuwa ▁ninyi ▁ni ▁watu ▁waaminifu : ▁Mwach eni ▁mmoja ▁wa ▁ndugu ▁zenu ▁pamoja ▁nami ▁hapa , ▁kisha ▁nend eni ▁mpe leke ▁chakula ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁jamaa ▁yenu ▁inay otes eka ▁kwa ▁njaa . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁m let eni ▁huyo ▁ndugu ▁yenu ▁mdogo ▁kwangu , ▁ndipo ▁nitaj ua ▁kuwa ▁ninyi ▁sio ▁wap elele zi , ▁ila ▁ni ▁watu ▁waaminifu . ▁Kisha ▁nit am rud isha ▁ndugu ▁yenu , ▁nanyi ▁mta weza ▁kufanya ▁biashara ▁katika ▁nchi ▁hii .' ▁" </s> swh_Latn
▁Wali p okuwa ▁wan am imina ▁naf aka ▁kutoka ▁kwenye ▁mag unia ▁yao , ▁ndani ▁ya ▁gun ia ▁la ▁kila ▁mtu ▁kulikuwa ▁na ▁mf uko ▁wa ▁fedha ! ▁Wakati ▁wao ▁na ▁baba ▁yao ▁wali po ona ▁mif uko ▁ya ▁fedha , ▁waka ogopa . </s> swh_Latn

▁Ndipo ▁was imami zi ▁wa ▁Ki israeli ▁waka enda ▁kum li lia ▁Farao , ▁wak isema : ▁" M bona ▁ume wat ende a ▁watumishi ▁wako ▁hivi ? </s> swh_Latn

▁Farao ▁akasema , ▁" N inyi ▁ni ▁wa vi vu ▁ndiyo ▁sababu ▁m nas ema , ▁' T uruh usu ▁tw ende ▁tuk am to lee ▁Bwana ▁dha bihu .' </s> swh_Latn
▁Sasa ▁nend eni ▁ka zini . ▁Ham ta pewa ▁ny asi ▁zo zote , ▁nanyi ▁ni ▁lazima ▁mt engene ze ▁mato fali . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Was imami zi ▁wa ▁Ki israeli ▁walit ambua ▁kuwa ▁wako ▁taab ani ▁wali po ambiwa , ▁" H amt aki wi ▁kupunguza ▁idadi ▁ya ▁mato fali ▁mli ot akiwa ▁kut engeneza ▁kila ▁siku . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Wali po ondoka ▁kwa ▁Farao , ▁waka waku ta ▁Mose ▁na ▁Aroni ▁wak ingo jea ▁kukutana ▁nao , </s> swh_Latn
▁waka wa ambia ▁Mose ▁na ▁Aroni , ▁" B wana ▁na ▁awa anga lie ▁a wah ukumu ▁ninyi ! ▁Mm etu fanya ▁tun uke ▁kwa ▁Farao ▁na ▁maaf isa ▁wake , ▁nanyi ▁mme weka ▁up anga ▁mik on oni ▁mwa o ▁ili ▁kutu ua ▁sisi . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Mose ▁ak aru di ▁kwa ▁Bwana ▁na ▁kum wambia , ▁" Ee ▁Bwana , ▁mbona ▁ume wale tea ▁watu ▁hawa ▁taa bu ? ▁Kwa ▁nini ▁basi ▁ukan ituma ▁mimi ? </s> swh_Latn

" </s> swh_Latn

▁M to ▁Na ili ▁uta fur ika ▁vy ura . ▁Wat akuja ▁kwenye ▁j umba ▁lako ▁la ▁kif alme ▁na ▁katika ▁chumba ▁chako ▁cha ▁kulala ▁na ▁kit and ani ▁mw ako , ▁katika ▁nyumba ▁za ▁maaf isa ▁wako ▁na ▁kwa ▁watu ▁wako , ▁vy ura ▁hao ▁wata ingia ▁katika ▁meko ▁yenu ▁na ▁kwenye ▁vyombo ▁vya ▁kuk andia ▁unga . </s> swh_Latn

▁Mose ▁akam wambia ▁Farao , ▁" Nin aku pa ▁heshima ▁ya ▁ku amua ▁ni ▁wakati ▁gani ▁wa ▁kuku ombe a ▁wewe , ▁maaf isa ▁wako ▁na ▁watu ▁wako ▁ili ▁kwamba ▁vy ura ▁wat oke ▁kwenu ▁na ▁kwenye ▁nyumba ▁zenu . ▁Isip okuwa ▁wale ▁walio ▁katika ▁M to ▁Na ili . " </s> swh_Latn

▁Ndipo ▁Bwana ▁akam wambia ▁Mose , ▁" M wamb ie ▁Aroni , ▁' Nyo osha ▁f imbo ▁yako ▁u yap ige ▁mav umbi ▁ya ▁ardhi ,' ▁nayo ▁nchi ▁yote ▁ya ▁Misri ▁mav umbi ▁yat akuwa ▁vir ob oto . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Waka fanya ▁hivyo , ▁Aroni ▁ali pon yo osha ▁mkono ▁wake ▁wenye ▁f imbo ▁na ▁kuya piga ▁mav umbi ▁ya ▁nchi , ▁vir ob oto ▁waka wa jia ▁watu ▁na ▁wanyama . ▁Mav umbi ▁yote ▁katika ▁nchi ▁ya ▁Misri ▁yaka wa ▁vir ob oto . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁wag anga ▁wali poj aribu ▁kut engeneza ▁vir ob oto ▁kwa ▁siri ▁ya ▁ug anga ▁wao , ▁hawaku weza . ▁Nao ▁vir ob oto ▁walikuwa ▁juu ▁ya ▁watu ▁na ▁wanyama . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wag anga ▁wale ▁wakam wambia ▁Farao , ▁" H iki ▁ni ▁kido le ▁cha ▁Mungu . " ▁Lakini ▁moyo ▁wa ▁Farao ▁ukawa ▁mg umu ▁naye ▁haku was ikiliza , ▁kama ▁vile ▁Bwana ▁ali vy osema . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kisha ▁Bwana ▁akam wambia ▁Mose , ▁" Am ka ▁mapema ▁asubuhi ▁na ▁us im ame ▁mbele ▁ya ▁Farao ▁wakati ▁anap ok wenda ▁mt oni ▁nawe ▁um wamb ie , ▁' H ili ▁ndilo ▁Bwana ▁asem alo : ▁Wa ach ie ▁watu ▁wangu ▁wa ende , ▁ili ▁wap ate ▁kun ia b udu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kama ▁hu tawa ach ia ▁watu ▁wangu ▁wa ond oke ▁nit aku pe leke a ▁mak undi ▁ya ▁main zi ▁juu ▁yako , ▁kwa ▁maaf isa ▁wako , ▁kwa ▁watu ▁wako ▁na ▁kwenye ▁nyumba ▁zenu . ▁Nyumba ▁za ▁W amis ri ▁zita ja zwa ▁main zi , ▁hata ▁na ▁ardhi ▁yote ▁ya ▁Misri . </s> swh_Latn
▁" ▁' L akini ▁siku ▁ile ▁nita fanya ▁kitu ▁tofauti ▁katika ▁nchi ▁ya ▁G osh eni , ▁ambapo ▁watu ▁wangu ▁wana ishi , ▁h apat aku wepo ▁na ▁mak undi ▁ya ▁main zi , ▁ili ▁mpate ▁kujua ▁kwamba ▁Mimi , ▁Bwana , ▁niko ▁katika ▁nchi ▁hii . </s> swh_Latn
▁N ita weka ▁tofauti ▁kati ▁ya ▁watu ▁wangu ▁na ▁watu ▁wenu . ▁Ish ara ▁hii ▁ya ▁ajabu ▁itat okea ▁kes ho .' ▁" </s> swh_Latn
▁Naye ▁Bwana ▁aka fanya ▁hivyo . ▁Mak undi ▁makubwa ▁ya ▁main zi ▁ya lim imin ika ▁katika ▁j umba ▁la ▁kif alme ▁la ▁Farao ▁na ▁katika ▁nyumba ▁za ▁maaf isa ▁wake , ▁pia ▁nchi ▁yote ▁ya ▁Misri ▁ika hari biwa ▁na ▁main zi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ndipo ▁Farao ▁akam wita ▁Mose ▁na ▁Aroni ▁na ▁kuwa ambia , ▁" N end eni ▁m kam to lee ▁Mungu ▁wenu ▁dha bihu ▁katika ▁nchi ▁hii . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁Mose ▁akam wambia , ▁" H ilo ▁halit akuwa ▁sawa . ▁Dhabi hu ▁tut aka zom to lea ▁Bwana ▁Mungu ▁wetu ▁zit akuwa ▁ch uk izo ▁kwa ▁W amis ri . ▁Kama ▁tuk itoa ▁dha bihu ▁ambazo ▁ni ▁ch uk izo ▁mbele ▁yao , ▁je , ▁ha wat at upi ga ▁mawe ? </s> swh_Latn
▁Ni ▁lazima ▁tw ende ▁mw endo ▁wa ▁siku ▁tatu ▁mpaka ▁tuf ike ▁jang wani ▁ili ▁tum to lee ▁Bwana ▁Mungu ▁wetu ▁dha bihu , ▁kama ▁ali vy otu agiza . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Farao ▁akam wambia , ▁" N ita war uhusu ▁mw ende ▁kum to lea ▁Bwana ▁Mungu ▁wenu ▁dha bihu ▁huko ▁jang wani , ▁lakini ▁ham na ▁ruh usa ▁kwenda ▁mbali ▁sana . ▁Sasa ▁m ni ombe e . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Mose ▁aka jibu , ▁" M ara ▁tu ▁nit ak apo ondoka , ▁nit am w omba ▁Bwana ▁na ▁kes ho ▁main zi ▁yata ondoka ▁kwa ▁Farao , ▁kwa ▁maaf isa ▁wake ▁na ▁kwa ▁watu ▁wake . ▁Hak ikisha ▁tu ▁kwamba ▁Farao ▁hat at enda ▁kwa ▁ud ang anyi fu ▁tena ▁kwa ▁kut okuwa ach ia ▁watu ▁wa ende ▁kum to lea ▁Bwana ▁dha bihu . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Ndipo ▁Mose ▁akam wa cha ▁Farao ▁na ▁kumw omba ▁Bwana , </s> swh_Latn
▁naye ▁Bwana ▁aka fanya ▁lile ▁Mose ▁ali lom w omba . ▁Ma inzi ▁yaka ondoka ▁kwa ▁Farao , ▁kwa ▁maaf isa ▁wake ▁na ▁kwa ▁watu ▁wake , ▁wala ▁hakuna ▁hata ▁in zi ▁aliye bak ia . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁wakati ▁huu ▁pia ▁Farao ▁aka ushu pa za ▁moyo ▁wake , ▁wala ▁haku war uhusu ▁Waisraeli ▁wa ond oke . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ndipo ▁Bwana ▁akam wambia ▁Mose , ▁" N enda ▁kwa ▁Farao ▁uk am wamb ie , ▁' H ili ▁ndilo ▁Bwana , ▁Mungu ▁wa ▁Wa eb rania ▁asem alo : ▁" Wa ach ie ▁watu ▁wangu ▁wa ende ▁ili ▁wap ate ▁kun ia b udu . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Kama ▁uk ik ataa ▁kuwa ach ia ▁wa ende , ▁nawe ▁uki endelea ▁kuw ash iki lia , </s> swh_Latn
▁mkono ▁wa ▁Bwana ▁uta leta ▁p igo ▁baya ▁kwa ▁mif ugo ▁yako , ▁juu ▁ya ▁far asi ▁wako , ▁punda , ▁ngam ia , ▁ng ʼ ombe ▁wako , ▁kondo o ▁na ▁mbu zi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁Bwana ▁ata weka ▁tofauti ▁kati ▁ya ▁mif ugo ▁ya ▁Israeli ▁na ▁ile ▁ya ▁Misri , ▁kwamba ▁hakuna ▁m nyama ▁wa ▁Mwis ra eli ▁at akay eku fa .' ▁" </s> swh_Latn
▁Bwana ▁aka weka ▁wakati ▁na ▁kusema , ▁" K esho ▁Bwana ▁ata li ten da ▁hili ▁katika ▁nchi . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Siku ▁iliyo fuata ▁Bwana ▁aka li ten da : ▁Mi f ugo ▁yote ▁ya ▁W amis ri ▁ika fa , ▁lakini ▁hakuna ▁hata ▁m nyama ▁mmoja ▁wa ▁wana ▁wa ▁Israeli ▁aliy eku fa . </s> swh_Latn
▁Farao ▁akat uma ▁watu ▁kuch unguza , ▁nao ▁wak aku ta ▁kuwa ▁hakuna ▁hata ▁m nyama ▁mmoja ▁wa ▁Waisraeli ▁aliy eku fa . ▁Lakini ▁moyo ▁wa ▁Farao ▁ha uk uku bali ▁kuwa ach ia ▁watu ▁wa ende . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kisha ▁Bwana ▁akam wambia ▁Mose ▁na ▁Aroni , ▁" Ch uku eni ▁maji vu ▁ya ▁tan uru , ▁naye ▁Mose ▁ayar ushe ▁ang ani ▁mbele ▁ya ▁Farao . </s> swh_Latn
▁Yat akuwa ▁vumbi ▁jep esi ▁juu ▁ya ▁nchi ▁yote ▁ya ▁Misri , ▁pia ▁yat at okea ▁maji pu ▁yenye ▁kuf ura ▁juu ▁ya ▁watu ▁na ▁wanyama ▁katika ▁nchi ▁yote . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Basi ▁waka chukua ▁maji vu ▁kwenye ▁tan uru ▁na ▁kusim ama ▁mbele ▁ya ▁Farao . ▁Mose ▁ak ayar usha ▁he wani , ▁nayo ▁maji pu ▁yenye ▁kuf ura ▁yak at okea ▁mi ilini ▁mwa ▁watu ▁na ▁wanyama . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wag anga ▁hawaku weza ▁kusim ama ▁mbele ▁ya ▁Mose ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁ya ▁maji pu ▁yale ▁yaliy okuwa ▁mi ilini ▁mwa o ▁na ▁juu ▁ya ▁miili ▁ya ▁W amis ri ▁wote . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁Bwana ▁aka uf anya ▁moyo ▁wa ▁Farao ▁kuwa ▁mg umu , ▁naye ▁haku was ikiliza ▁Mose ▁na ▁Aroni , ▁sa wasa wa ▁kama ▁vile ▁Bwana ▁ali vyokuwa ▁am em wambia ▁Mose . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kisha ▁Bwana ▁akam wambia ▁Mose , ▁" Am ka ▁mapema ▁asubuhi , ▁us im ame ▁mbele ▁ya ▁Farao , ▁um wamb ie , ▁' H ili ▁ndilo ▁asem alo ▁Bwana , ▁Mungu ▁wa ▁Wa eb rania : ▁Wa ach ie ▁watu ▁wangu ▁wa ende , ▁ili ▁kwamba ▁wawe ze ▁kun ia b udu , </s> swh_Latn

▁Kwa ▁kuwa ▁mpaka ▁sasa ▁ning eli kuwa ▁nim enyo osha ▁mkono ▁wangu ▁na ▁kuku piga ▁wewe ▁na ▁watu ▁wako ▁kwa ▁p igo ▁ambalo ▁ling eku futi lia ▁mbali ▁juu ▁ya ▁nchi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁nim eku in ua ▁wewe ▁kwa ▁kusudi ▁hili ▁hasa , ▁ili ▁nip ate ▁kuku onyesha ▁uwezo ▁wangu , ▁na ▁ili ▁Jina ▁langu ▁lip ate ▁kutanga zwa ▁duniani ▁yote . </s> swh_Latn
▁Bado ▁una endelea ▁kuji in ua ▁juu ▁ya ▁watu ▁wangu , ▁wala ▁h utaki ▁kuwa ach ia ▁wa ende . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁hiyo , ▁kes ho ▁wakati ▁kama ▁huu ▁nita leta ▁mvua ▁mbaya ▁sana ▁ya ▁mawe ▁ambayo ▁hai jap ata ▁kuny esha ▁katika ▁nchi ▁ya ▁Misri , ▁tangu ▁siku ▁ili po umbwa ▁mpaka ▁leo . </s> swh_Latn
▁Sasa ▁toa ▁amri ▁ur ud ishe ▁wanyama ▁wote ▁wat oke ▁mal ishoni ▁na ▁chochote ▁ambacho ▁ki po ▁mash ambani ▁waje ▁mpaka ▁mahali ▁pa ▁usalama , ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁mvua ▁ya ▁mawe ▁it any esha ▁juu ▁ya ▁kila ▁mtu ▁na ▁kila ▁m nyama ▁ambaye ▁haja let wa ▁ndani ▁ambao ▁bado ▁wako ▁nje ▁mash ambani , ▁nao ▁wat aku fa .' ▁" </s> swh_Latn
▁Wale ▁maaf isa ▁wa ▁Farao ▁ambao ▁wali li ogopa ▁neno ▁la ▁Bwana ▁waka fanya ▁haraka ▁kuwa leta ▁wat umwa ▁wao ▁na ▁mif ugo ▁yao ▁ndani . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁wale ▁wali op uuza ▁neno ▁la ▁Bwana ▁waka wa acha ▁wat umwa ▁wao ▁na ▁mif ugo ▁yao ▁sh ambani . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ndipo ▁Bwana ▁akam wambia ▁Mose , ▁" Nyo osha ▁mkono ▁wako ▁kuelekea ▁ang ani ▁ili ▁kwamba ▁mvua ▁ya ▁mawe ▁iny eshe ▁juu ▁ya ▁Misri ▁yote , ▁juu ▁ya ▁watu , ▁wanyama ▁na ▁juu ▁ya ▁kila ▁kitu ▁ki ota cho ▁katika ▁mash amba ▁ya ▁Misri . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Mose ▁alipo inyo osha ▁f imbo ▁yake ▁kuelekea ▁ang ani , ▁Bwana ▁akat uma ▁ngur umo ▁na ▁mvua ▁ya ▁mawe , ▁um eme ▁wa ▁radi ▁u limuli ka ▁hadi ▁nchi . ▁Kwa ▁hiyo ▁Bwana ▁aka ifanya ▁mvua ▁ya ▁mawe ▁kuny esha ▁juu ▁ya ▁nchi ▁ya ▁Misri , </s> swh_Latn
▁mvua ▁ya ▁mawe ▁ik any esha ▁na ▁radi ▁ik amu lika ▁pote . ▁Ika wa ▁dh oru ba ▁ya ▁kut isha ▁ambayo ▁hai j aku wako ▁katika ▁nchi ▁ya ▁Misri , ▁tangu ▁nchi ▁hiyo ▁iwe ▁taifa . </s> swh_Latn
▁M vua ▁ya ▁mawe ▁ika hari bu ▁kila ▁kitu ▁katika ▁nchi ▁ya ▁Misri ▁kilich okuwa ▁katika ▁mash amba , ▁watu ▁na ▁wanyama , ▁ika hari bu ▁kila ▁kitu ▁kinacho ota ▁mash ambani ▁na ▁kuv unja ▁kila ▁mti . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ma hali ▁pekee ▁ambapo ▁mvua ▁ya ▁mawe ▁ha ik uny esha ▁ni ▁nchi ▁ya ▁G osh eni , ▁amb ako ▁Waisraeli ▁wali ishi . </s> swh_Latn

▁Mw omb eni ▁Bwana , ▁kwa ▁kuwa ▁tume pata ▁ngur umo ▁na ▁mvua ▁za ▁mawe ▁za ▁kut ut osha . ▁N ita wa ach ia ▁mw ond oke ; ▁ham tah itaji ▁kung oja ▁zaidi . " </s> swh_Latn

▁( K itani ▁na ▁shay iri ▁vi lih ari biwa , ▁kwa ▁kuwa ▁shay iri ▁ilikuwa ▁na ▁mas uke , ▁na ▁kit ani ▁ilikuwa ▁katika ▁kutoa ▁maua . </s> swh_Latn
▁Hata ▁hivyo , ▁ngano ▁na ▁jamii ▁nyingine ▁ya ▁ngano ▁ha zik uhari biwa ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁zili kuwa ▁hazi jak omaa ▁bado .) </s> swh_Latn
▁Kisha ▁Mose ▁aka ondoka ▁kwa ▁Farao ▁aka enda ▁nje ▁ya ▁mji . ▁Mose ▁akan yo osha ▁mikono ▁yake ▁kuelekea ▁kwa ▁Bwana , ▁ngur umo ▁na ▁mvua ▁ya ▁mawe ▁vik akoma , ▁mvua ▁haiku endelea ▁tena ▁kuny esha ▁nchini . </s> swh_Latn
▁Farao ▁alipo ona ▁kwamba ▁mvua ▁ya ▁mawe ▁na ▁ngur umo ▁zim ek oma , ▁aka fanya ▁dhambi ▁tena . ▁Yeye ▁na ▁maaf isa ▁wake ▁waka fanya ▁mioyo ▁yao ▁kuwa ▁mig umu . </s> swh_Latn

▁Ndipo ▁Bwana ▁akam wambia ▁Mose , ▁" N enda ▁kwa ▁Farao , ▁kwa ▁kuwa ▁nime uf anya ▁moyo ▁wake ▁kuwa ▁mg umu ▁na ▁mioyo ▁ya ▁maaf isa ▁wake ▁ili ▁kwamba ▁nip ate ▁kutenda ▁ishara ▁hizi ▁zangu ▁za ▁ajabu ▁miongoni ▁mwa o </s> swh_Latn

▁Kwa ▁hiyo ▁Mose ▁na ▁Aroni ▁waka enda ▁kwa ▁Farao ▁na ▁kum wambia , ▁" H ili ▁ndilo ▁Bwana , ▁Mungu ▁wa ▁Wa eb rania , ▁asem alo : ▁' U ta endelea ▁hata ▁lini ▁kuk ataa ▁kun yen yeke a ▁mbele ▁yangu ? ▁Wa ach ie ▁watu ▁wangu ▁wa ende , ▁ili ▁wap ate ▁kun ia b udu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kama ▁uk ik ataa ▁kuwa ach ia ▁wa ende , ▁kes ho ▁nita leta ▁nz ige ▁katika ▁nchi ▁yako . </s> swh_Latn
▁Nao ▁wata funika ▁uso ▁wa ▁ardhi ▁hata ▁usi onek ane . ▁Wat ata funa ▁mab aki ▁mach ache ▁yaliyo bak izwa ▁baada ▁ya ▁ile ▁mvua ▁ya ▁mawe , ▁yaani ▁pamoja ▁na ▁kila ▁mti ▁unao ota ▁katika ▁mash amba ▁yenu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Nz ige ▁hao ▁wata ja za ▁nyumba ▁zako , ▁za ▁maaf isa ▁wako ▁wote ▁na ▁za ▁W amis ri ▁wote . ▁Jambo ▁ambalo ▁baba ▁zenu ▁wala ▁babu ▁zenu ▁hawa jap ata ▁kuona ▁tangu ▁siku ▁ile ▁wali po anza ▁kuishi ▁katika ▁nchi ▁hii ▁mpaka ▁leo ▁hii .' ▁" ▁Ndipo ▁Mose ▁ak age uka ▁na ▁kumwa cha ▁Farao . </s> swh_Latn
▁Maaf isa ▁wa ▁Farao ▁wakam wambia , ▁" M paka ▁lini ▁huyu ▁mtu ▁atakuwa ▁tan zi ▁kwetu ? ▁Wa ach ie ▁hao ▁watu ▁wa ende ▁zao , ▁ili ▁wap ate ▁kum wab udu ▁Bwana ▁Mungu ▁wao . ▁Je , ▁bado ▁hut ambu i ▁kuwa ▁Misri ▁ime ang amia ?" </s> swh_Latn
▁Ndipo ▁Mose ▁na ▁Aroni ▁waka let wa ▁kwa ▁Farao . ▁Farao ▁akawa ambia , ▁" N end eni , ▁m kam wab udu ▁Bwana ▁Mungu ▁wenu . ▁Lakini ▁ni ▁nani ▁hasa ▁wataka ok wenda ?" </s> swh_Latn
▁Mose ▁aka jibu , ▁" T utak wenda ▁na ▁vijana ▁wetu ▁na ▁wazee , ▁pamoja ▁na ▁wana ▁wetu ▁na ▁binti ▁zetu , ▁pia ▁pamoja ▁na ▁kondo o ▁zetu , ▁ng ʼ ombe , ▁mbu zi , ▁far asi ▁na ▁punda ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁tuta adh im isha ▁sik ukuu ▁kwa ▁Bwana . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Farao ▁akasema , ▁" B wana ▁awe ▁pamoja ▁nanyi , ▁kama ▁niki war uhusu ▁mw ond oke ▁pamoja ▁na ▁wanawake ▁wenu ▁na ▁watoto ▁wenu ! ▁Ni ▁wazi ▁kwamba ▁mna ▁mak usu di ▁mabaya . </s> swh_Latn
▁La ▁has ha ! ▁Wana ume ▁peke ▁yao ▁na ▁wa ende , ▁wakam wab udu ▁Bwana , ▁kwa ▁kuwa ▁hilo ▁ndilo ▁mm ekuwa ▁m ki omba . " ▁Kwa ▁hiyo ▁Mose ▁na ▁Aroni ▁waka ondo lewa ▁mbele ▁ya ▁Farao . </s> swh_Latn
▁Basi ▁Bwana ▁akam wambia ▁Mose , ▁" Nyo osha ▁mkono ▁wako ▁juu ▁ya ▁Misri ▁ili ▁kundi ▁la ▁nz ige ▁li weze ▁kuingia ▁juu ▁ya ▁nchi ▁na ▁kuta funa ▁kila ▁kitu ▁ki ota cho ▁katika ▁mash amba ▁na ▁kila ▁kitu ▁kilich osa zwa ▁na ▁ile ▁mvua ▁ya ▁mawe . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁hiyo ▁Mose ▁akan yo osha ▁f imbo ▁yake ▁juu ▁ya ▁Misri , ▁Bwana ▁aka ule ta ▁upe po ▁wa ▁mashar iki ▁uka vuma ▁katika ▁nchi ▁yote ▁m chana ▁wote ▁na ▁usiku ▁kucha , ▁kufikia ▁asubuhi ▁upe po ▁ukawa ▁umele ta ▁nz ige . </s> swh_Latn

▁" F anyi za ▁kif uko ▁cha ▁ki fu ani ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁kufanya ▁maamuzi , ▁kazi ▁ya ▁fundi ▁stadi . ▁Kit engene ze ▁kama ▁kile ▁kisi bau : ▁cha ▁dhahabu , ▁na ▁nyu zi ▁za ▁rangi ▁ya ▁bulu u , ▁za ▁z ambara u , ▁na ▁za ▁rangi ▁ny ek undu , ▁cha ▁kit ani ▁safi ▁ili yos okot wa . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kit akuwa ▁cha ▁m raba , ▁chenye ▁ure fu ▁wa ▁shi biri ▁moja ▁na ▁up ana ▁wa ▁shi biri ▁moja , ▁na ▁kikun jwe ▁mara ▁mbili . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kisha ▁weka ▁sa fu ▁nne ▁za ▁vito ▁vya ▁thamani ▁juu ▁yake . ▁Sa fu ▁ya ▁kwanza ▁itakuwa ▁na ▁ak iki , ▁yakuti ▁manj ano ▁na ▁za bara jadi ; </s> swh_Latn
▁katika ▁sa fu ▁ya ▁pili ▁itakuwa ▁na ▁al masi , ▁yakuti ▁sama wi ▁na ▁zum ar idi ; </s> swh_Latn
▁sa fu ▁ya ▁tatu ▁itakuwa ▁na ▁hi ak intho , ▁ak iki ▁ny ek undu ▁na ▁am eth isto ; </s> swh_Latn
▁na ▁sa fu ▁ya ▁nne ▁itakuwa ▁na ▁kris o lit ho , ▁sho hamu ▁na ▁yas pi . ▁Yo te ▁yati we ▁kwenye ▁vi jali zo ▁vya ▁dhahabu . </s> swh_Latn

▁nazo ▁zile ▁ncha ▁nyingine ▁za ▁mku fu ▁zi f unge ▁kwenye ▁vile ▁vi jali zo ▁vi wili , ▁na ▁uz ish ik aman ishe ▁na ▁vile ▁vi pande ▁vya ▁mabe ga ▁vya ▁kile ▁kisi bau ▁upande ▁wa ▁mbele . </s> swh_Latn

▁Teng ene za ▁pete ▁nyingine ▁mbili ▁za ▁dhahabu , ▁na ▁uz ish ik aman ishe ▁sehemu ▁ya ▁chini ▁ya ▁vi pande ▁vya ▁mabe ga ▁upande ▁wa ▁mbele ▁wa ▁kile ▁kisi bau , ▁karibu ▁na ▁p indo ▁juu ▁kidogo ▁ya ▁m shi pi ▁wa ▁kiun oni ▁wa ▁kisi bau . </s> swh_Latn

▁Pia ▁weka ▁Ur imu ▁na ▁Th um imu ▁ndani ▁ya ▁kif uko ▁cha ▁ki fu ani , ▁yawe ▁juu ▁ya ▁moyo ▁wa ▁Aroni ▁kila ▁mara ▁aing iapo ▁mbele ▁za ▁Bwana . ▁Kwa ▁hiyo ▁siku ▁zote ▁Aroni ▁atakuwa ▁na ▁uwezo ▁kufanya ▁maamuzi ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁wana ▁wa ▁Israeli ▁mbele ▁za ▁Bwana . </s> swh_Latn

▁na ▁katikati ▁u weke ▁nafasi ▁ya ▁ku ingiz ia ▁kichwa . ▁Kut akuwa ▁na ▁ute pe ▁ulio fum wa , ▁unao fanana ▁na ▁uk osi ▁ku iz unguka ▁nafasi ▁hiyo , ▁ili ▁is ich an ike . </s> swh_Latn

▁Ni ▁lazima ▁Aroni ▁ali vae ▁anap of anya ▁huduma . ▁Sa uti ▁ya ▁hivyo ▁vik engele ▁it asik ika ▁an apo ingia ▁na ▁kutoka ▁Ma hali ▁Pat akatifu ▁mbele ▁za ▁Bwana , ▁ili ▁asi je ▁aka fa . </s> swh_Latn

▁Kila ▁mmoja ▁anay ek wenda ▁upande ▁wa ▁wale ▁wali ok wisha ▁hesa biwa ▁at atoa ▁nusu ▁sh ekeli , ▁kulingana ▁na ▁sh ekeli ▁ya ▁mahali ▁pat akatifu , ▁ambayo ▁ina ▁uzito ▁wa ▁gera ▁is hir ini . ▁Hii ▁nusu ▁sh ekeli ▁ni ▁sadaka ▁kwa ▁Bwana . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wote ▁wale ▁wana ov uka , ▁wenye ▁umri ▁wa ▁miaka ▁is hir ini ▁au ▁zaidi , ▁wat atoa ▁sadaka ▁kwa ▁Bwana . </s> swh_Latn

▁Kisha ▁Bwana ▁akam wambia ▁Mose , </s> swh_Latn
▁" Wa ambie ▁Waisraeli , ▁' N inyi ▁ni ▁lazima ▁mz ish ike ▁Sabato ▁zangu . ▁Hii ▁itakuwa ▁ni ▁ishara ▁kati ▁yangu ▁na ▁ninyi ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁vi zazi ▁vi ja vyo , ▁ili ▁mpate ▁kujua ▁kwamba ▁Mimi ▁Nd imi ▁Bwana , ▁ni wa fany aye ▁ninyi ▁wat akatifu . </s> swh_Latn

▁Bwana ▁ali pom aliza ▁kusema ▁na ▁Mose ▁juu ▁ya ▁M lima ▁Sinai , ▁Mungu ▁ak ampa ▁vile ▁vi bao ▁vi wili ▁vya ▁Us hu huda , ▁vi bao ▁vya ▁mawe ▁vili vyo andikwa ▁kwa ▁kido le ▁cha ▁Mungu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Watu ▁wali po ona ▁kuwa ▁Mose ▁am eka wia ▁sana ▁kush uka ▁kutoka ▁m lim ani , ▁walim kus any ikia ▁Aroni ▁na ▁kum wambia , ▁" N joo , ▁tut engene zee ▁mi ungu ▁it akay ot ut angu lia . ▁Kwa ▁maana ▁huyu ▁jamaa ▁yetu ▁Mose ▁ali yet up and isha ▁kutoka ▁Misri , ▁hatu jui ▁jambo ▁lilil omp ata . " </s> swh_Latn

▁Kwa ▁hiyo ▁watu ▁wote ▁waka vua ▁vi puli ▁vya o , ▁waka vi leta ▁kwa ▁Aroni . </s> swh_Latn

▁Wam ekuwa ▁wep esi ▁ku ge uka ▁na ▁kuacha ▁nili yowa am uru , ▁na ▁wame jit engene zea ▁san amu ▁ya ▁ku yey usha ▁yenye ▁um bo ▁la ▁nd ama . ▁W ame is uj udia ▁na ▁ku ito lea ▁dha bihu , ▁nao ▁wam esema , ▁' H ii ▁ndiyo ▁mi ungu ▁yenu , ▁ee ▁Israeli ▁ili yok up and isha ▁kutoka ▁Misri .' ▁" </s> swh_Latn

▁Lakini ▁Mose ▁akam si hi ▁Bwana ▁Mungu ▁wake , ▁akasema , ▁" Ee ▁Bwana , ▁kwa ▁nini ▁hasira ▁yako ▁iw ake ▁dhidi ▁ya ▁watu ▁wako , ▁wale ▁ulio w atoa ▁Misri ▁kwa ▁u weza ▁mkuu ▁na ▁mkono ▁wenye ▁nguvu ? </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁nini ▁W amis ri ▁was eme , ▁' Ni ▁kwa ▁nia ▁mbaya ▁ali w atoa ▁Misri , ▁ili ▁awa ue ▁mi lim ani ▁na ▁kuwa futa ▁us oni ▁mwa ▁dunia '? ▁Achi lia ▁mbali ▁hasira ▁yako ▁kali , ▁wa one e ▁huruma ▁na ▁us ile te ▁maa fa ▁juu ▁ya ▁watu ▁wako . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wak umb uke ▁watumishi ▁wako ▁Abrahamu , ▁Is aki ▁na ▁Israeli , ▁ambao ▁uli wa apia ▁kwa ▁nafsi ▁yako ▁mwenyewe : ▁' N ita wa fanya ▁uza o ▁wako ▁kuwa ▁wengi ▁kama ▁nyota ▁za ▁ang ani , ▁nami ▁nita wa pa ▁wa zao ▁wako ▁nchi ▁hii ▁yote ▁ambayo ▁ni liwa ah idia , ▁nayo ▁itakuwa ▁ur ithi ▁wao ▁milele .' ▁" </s> swh_Latn
▁Kisha ▁Bwana ▁akawa onea ▁huruma , ▁wala ▁haku leta ▁juu ▁ya ▁watu ▁wake ▁maa fa ▁aliy okuwa ▁amek us udia . </s> swh_Latn
▁Mose ▁ak age uka , ▁akash uka ▁kutoka ▁m lim ani ▁akiwa ▁na ▁vi bao ▁vi wili ▁vya ▁Us hu huda ▁mik on oni ▁mwake . ▁V ili kuwa ▁v ime andikwa ▁pande ▁zote ▁mbili , ▁mbele ▁na ▁nyuma . </s> swh_Latn
▁Vi bao ▁hivyo ▁vi likuwa ▁kazi ▁ya ▁Mungu ; ▁maand ishi ▁yalikuwa ▁mw andiko ▁wa ▁Mungu , ▁yaliyo ch orwa ▁kama ▁muh uri ▁juu ▁ya ▁vi bao . </s> swh_Latn

▁Mose ▁aka jibu : ▁" Si ▁sauti ▁ya ▁us hindi , ▁wala ▁si ▁sauti ▁ya ▁kus hind wa ; ▁ni ▁sauti ▁ya ▁kuimba ▁nin ayos ikia . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Mose ▁alipo ikari bia ▁kambi ▁na ▁kuona ▁yule ▁nd ama ▁na ▁ile ▁michezo , ▁hasira ▁yake ▁ika waka , ▁ak atu pa ▁vile ▁vi bao ▁vili vyokuwa ▁mik on oni ▁mwake , ▁aka vi pas ua ▁vi pande ▁vi pande ▁pale ▁chini ▁ya ▁m lima . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kisha ▁akam chukua ▁yule ▁nd ama ▁waliokuwa ▁wam emt engeneza ▁na ▁kum ch oma ▁kwenye ▁moto , ▁kisha ▁akam sa ga ▁kuwa ▁unga , ▁akany un yiza ▁kwenye ▁maji ▁na ▁kuwa fanya ▁Waisraeli ▁wany we . </s> swh_Latn
▁Mose ▁akam wambia ▁Aroni , ▁" W atu ▁hawa ▁wali ku fanyia ▁nini , ▁hata ▁ukawa ongoza ▁kufanya ▁dhambi ▁kubwa ▁hivyo ?" </s> swh_Latn
▁Aroni ▁akam wambia , ▁" U sik asir ike ▁bwana ▁wangu . ▁Una jua ▁jinsi ▁watu ▁hawa ▁wali vyo ▁tayari ▁kwa ▁ma ovu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wao ▁wal ini ambia , ▁' T uf anyie ▁mi ungu ▁it akay otu ongoza . ▁Kwa ▁kuwa ▁huyu ▁jamaa ▁yetu ▁Mose ▁ali yet up and isha ▁kutoka ▁Misri , ▁hatu fahamu ▁yaliy omp ata .' </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁hiyo ▁nika wa ambia , ▁' Ye yote ▁aliye ▁na ▁kito ▁chochote ▁cha ▁dhahabu ▁av ue .' ▁Kisha ▁wak ani pa ▁hiyo ▁dhahabu , ▁nami ▁nika itu pa ▁mot oni , ▁akat okea ▁huyu ▁nd ama !" </s> swh_Latn
▁Mose ▁aka ona ▁kuwa ▁watu ▁wame asi , ▁kwa ▁kuwa ▁Aroni ▁alikuwa ▁ame wa acha ▁wa asi , ▁na ▁hivyo ▁kuwa ▁kich ek esho ▁kwa ▁ad ui ▁zao . </s> swh_Latn

▁Wakat engeneza ▁pa zia ▁la ▁nyu zi ▁za ▁rangi ▁ya ▁bulu u , ▁za ▁z ambara u , ▁na ▁za ▁rangi ▁ny ek undu ▁na ▁kit ani ▁safi ▁ili yos okot wa ▁vizuri , ▁naye ▁fundi ▁stadi ▁akat irizi ▁mak eru bi ▁kwenye ▁hilo ▁pa zia . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wakat engeneza ▁ngu zo ▁nne ▁za ▁mti ▁wa ▁msh ita ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁yake ▁na ▁kuzi funika ▁kwa ▁dhahabu . ▁Wakat engeneza ▁kula bu ▁za ▁dhahabu ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁ngu zo ▁hizo , ▁na ▁kus ubu ▁vit ako ▁vinne ▁vya ▁fedha . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁ing ilio ▁la ▁hema ▁wakat engeneza ▁pa zia ▁la ▁nyu zi ▁za ▁rangi ▁ya ▁bulu u , ▁za ▁z ambara u , ▁na ▁za ▁rangi ▁ny ek undu ▁na ▁kit ani ▁safi ▁ili yos okot wa ▁vizuri , ▁kazi ▁ya ▁mt ari zi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Pia ▁wakat engeneza ▁ngu zo ▁tano ▁zenye ▁kula bu . ▁Waka funika ▁ncha ▁za ▁juu ▁za ▁hizo ▁ngu zo ▁pamoja ▁na ▁te pe ▁zake ▁kwa ▁dhahabu , ▁na ▁pia ▁wakat engeneza ▁vit ako ▁vyake ▁vit ano ▁vya ▁sha ba . </s> swh_Latn
▁Be za leli ▁akat engeneza ▁Sand uku ▁la ▁mba o ▁za ▁msh ita : ▁ure fu ▁wake ▁ulikuwa ▁dh iraa ▁mbili ▁na ▁nusu , ▁up ana ▁wake ▁dh iraa ▁moja ▁na ▁nusu , ▁na ▁kimo ▁chake ▁dh iraa ▁moja ▁na ▁nusu . </s> swh_Latn
▁A kali funika ▁kwa ▁dhahabu ▁safi ▁ndani ▁na ▁nje , ▁na ▁ku liz ung ush ia ▁uk ingo ▁wa ▁dhahabu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ak asu bu ▁pete ▁nne ▁za ▁dhahabu ▁na ▁kuzi fung ia ▁kwenye ▁miguu ▁yake ▁minne , ▁pete ▁mbili ▁kwa ▁upande ▁mmoja ▁na ▁pete ▁mbili ▁kwa ▁upande ▁mwingine . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kisha ▁akat engeneza ▁mip iko ▁ya ▁mti ▁wa ▁msh ita ▁na ▁kuzi funika ▁kwa ▁dhahabu . </s> swh_Latn
▁A kai ingiza ▁hiyo ▁mip iko ▁kwenye ▁zile ▁pete ▁katika ▁pande ▁mbili ▁za ▁Sand uku ▁ili ▁kuli beba . </s> swh_Latn
▁Akat engeneza ▁ki fun iko ▁cha ▁up atan isho ▁kwa ▁dhahabu ▁safi : ▁ure fu ▁wake ▁ulikuwa ▁dh iraa ▁mbili ▁na ▁nusu , ▁na ▁up ana ▁wake ▁dh iraa ▁moja ▁na ▁nusu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kisha ▁akat engeneza ▁mak eru bi ▁wawili ▁wa ▁dhahabu ▁iliyo fu liwa ▁katika ▁mi isho ▁ya ▁hicho ▁ki fun iko . </s> swh_Latn
▁Akat engeneza ▁ker ubi ▁mmoja ▁kwenye ▁mwisho ▁mmoja , ▁na ▁ker ubi ▁mwingine ▁kwenye ▁mwisho ▁mwingine ; ▁aka wat engeneza ▁kuwa ▁kitu ▁kimoja ▁na ▁hicho ▁ki fun iko ▁katika ▁mi isho ▁hiyo ▁miwili . </s> swh_Latn
▁Mak eru bi ▁hao ▁walikuwa ▁wam et anda za ▁ma bawa ▁kuelekea ▁juu , ▁wak itia ▁ki vuli ▁hicho ▁ki fun iko . ▁Mak eru bi ▁hao ▁wali eleke ana , ▁wak ita zama ▁hicho ▁ki fun iko . </s> swh_Latn

▁Ata ondoa ▁mafuta ▁yote , ▁kama ▁vile ▁mafuta ▁ya ondo lewa vyo ▁kutoka ▁kwenye ▁mwana - k ondo o ▁wa ▁sadaka ▁ya ▁amani , ▁naye ▁ku hani ▁ata yat ekete za ▁juu ▁ya ▁mad haba hu ▁juu ▁ya ▁zile ▁sadaka ▁ziliz otolewa ▁kwa ▁Bwana ▁kwa ▁moto . ▁Kwa ▁njia ▁hii ▁ku hani ▁ata fanya ▁up atan isho ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁yake ▁kwa ▁dhambi ▁ali yo it enda , ▁naye ▁atas amehe wa . </s> swh_Latn

" </s> swh_Latn
▁Hivyo ▁Aroni ▁aka ja ▁mad ha bah uni ▁na ▁kum chinja ▁yule ▁nd ama ▁kuwa ▁sadaka ▁ya ▁dhambi ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁yake ▁mwenyewe . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wana we ▁wakam le tea ▁damu , ▁naye ▁aka chov ya ▁kido le ▁chake ▁katika ▁hiyo ▁damu , ▁aka itia ▁kwenye ▁pem be ▁za ▁mad haba hu , ▁nayo ▁damu ▁iliyo baki ▁aka im waga ▁chini ▁ya ▁mad haba hu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Juu ▁ya ▁mad haba hu ▁ak atek eteza ▁mafuta , ▁f igo ▁na ▁mafuta ▁yanayo funika ▁ini ▁kutoka ▁kwenye ▁hiyo ▁sadaka ▁ya ▁dhambi , ▁kama ▁Bwana ▁ali vy om wagi za ▁Mose . </s> swh_Latn
▁Akat ekete za ▁nyama ▁na ▁ngozi ▁nje ▁ya ▁kambi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kisha ▁Aroni ▁aka chinja ▁sadaka ▁ya ▁kut ekete zwa . ▁Wana we ▁wakam le tea ▁damu , ▁naye ▁aka iny un yiza ▁pande ▁zote ▁za ▁mad haba hu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wak am le tea ▁sadaka ▁ya ▁kut ekete zwa ▁ki pande ▁kwa ▁ki pande , ▁pamoja ▁na ▁kichwa , ▁naye ▁aka vit ekete za ▁juu ▁ya ▁mad haba hu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ak asa fisha ▁sehemu ▁za ▁ndani ▁na ▁miguu , ▁aka vit ekete za ▁juu ▁ya ▁sadaka ▁ya ▁kut ekete zwa ▁juu ▁ya ▁mad haba hu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kisha ▁Aroni ▁aka leta ▁sadaka ▁ile ▁iliy okuwa ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁watu . ▁Aka chukua ▁yule ▁mbu zi ▁wa ▁sadaka ▁ya ▁dhambi ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁watu , ▁akam chinja ▁na ▁kum toa ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁sadaka ▁ya ▁dhambi , ▁kama ▁alivyo fanya ▁kwa ▁ile ▁ya ▁kwanza . </s> swh_Latn
▁Aroni ▁aka leta ▁sadaka ▁ya ▁kut ekete zwa ▁na ▁ku itoa ▁kama ▁ilivyo eleke zwa . </s> swh_Latn
▁Pia ▁aka leta ▁sadaka ▁ya ▁naf aka , ▁aka chukua ▁kon zi ▁moja ▁na ▁kuit ekete za ▁juu ▁ya ▁mad haba hu , ▁pamoja ▁na ▁sadaka ▁ya ▁kut ekete zwa ▁ya ▁asubuhi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Aka chinja ▁mak sai ▁na ▁kondo o ▁d ume ▁kama ▁sadaka ▁ya ▁amani ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁watu . ▁Wana we ▁Aroni ▁wak ampa ▁ile ▁damu , ▁naye ▁aka iny un yiza ▁kwenye ▁mad haba hu ▁pande ▁zote . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁sehemu ▁zile ▁za ▁mafuta ▁ya ▁yule ▁mak sai ▁na ▁kondo o ▁d ume , ▁yaani ▁mafuta ▁ya ▁mk ia , ▁mafuta ▁yaliyo funika ▁tum bo , ▁ya ▁f igo ▁na ▁yaliyo funika ▁ini , </s> swh_Latn
▁hivi ▁vyote ▁waka vi weka ▁juu ▁ya ▁vid ari , ▁kisha ▁Aroni ▁akay atek eteza ▁hayo ▁mafuta ▁ya ▁wanyama ▁juu ▁ya ▁mad haba hu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Aroni ▁aka viin ua ▁vile ▁vid ari ▁na ▁paja ▁la ▁kulia ▁mbele ▁za ▁Bwana ▁ili ▁vi we ▁sadaka ▁ya ▁ku inu liwa , ▁kama ▁Mose ▁alivyo agiza . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kisha ▁Aroni ▁aka in ua ▁mikono ▁yake ▁kuwa elekea ▁watu ▁na ▁kuwa bar iki . ▁Naye ▁baada ▁ya ▁kutoa ▁dha bihu ▁ya ▁sadaka ▁ya ▁dhambi , ▁sadaka ▁ya ▁kut ekete zwa , ▁na ▁sadaka ▁ya ▁amani , ▁akash uka ▁chini . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kisha ▁Mose ▁na ▁Aroni ▁waka ingia ▁kwenye ▁H ema ▁la ▁Kuk utan ia . ▁Wali pot oka ▁nje , ▁waka wa bar iki ▁watu . ▁Nao ▁utukufu ▁wa ▁Bwana ▁uka wat okea ▁watu ▁wote . </s> swh_Latn
▁Moto ▁uka ja ▁kutoka ▁uwe po ▁wa ▁Bwana , ▁uka ir amba ▁ile ▁sadaka ▁ya ▁kut ekete zwa , ▁pamoja ▁na ▁sehemu ▁ya ▁mafuta ▁yaliy okuwa ▁juu ▁ya ▁mad haba hu . ▁Watu ▁wote ▁wali po ona ▁jambo ▁hili , ▁wak api ga ▁ke lele ▁kwa ▁furaha ▁na ▁kus uj udu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Nada bu ▁na ▁Abi hu , ▁wana ▁wa ▁Aroni , ▁waka chukua ▁vy etezo ▁vya o , ▁waka weka ▁moto ▁ndani ▁yake ▁na ▁kuongeza ▁uv umba ; ▁kisha ▁wakam to lea ▁Bwana ▁moto ▁usio ▁hala li , ▁kiny ume ▁na ▁agi zo ▁la ▁Mungu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Hivyo ▁moto ▁uka ja ▁kutoka ▁kwa ▁uwe po ▁wa ▁Bwana ▁na ▁ku war amba , ▁nao ▁waka fa ▁mbele ▁za ▁Bwana . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kisha ▁Mose ▁akam wambia ▁Aroni , ▁" H ili ▁ndilo ▁ali lon ena ▁Bwana ▁wakati ▁ali pos ema : ▁" ▁' Mi ongoni ▁mwa ▁wale ▁wataka on ikari bia ▁n itaji onyesha ▁kuwa ▁m takatifu ; ▁mach oni ▁pa ▁watu ▁wote ▁nita hesh imiwa .' ▁" ▁Aroni ▁akany amaza . </s> swh_Latn
▁Mose ▁akawa ita ▁M isha eli ▁na ▁Elisa fani , ▁wana ▁wa ▁U zie li ▁mj omba ▁wake ▁Aroni , ▁akawa ambia , ▁" N jo oni ▁hapa . ▁Ondo eni ▁miili ▁ya ▁bin amu ▁zenu ▁mbele ▁ya ▁mahali ▁pat akatifu , ▁m kai pe leke ▁nje ▁ya ▁kambi . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Hivyo ▁waka ja ▁na ▁kuwa ondoa , ▁wakiwa ▁bado ▁wame va lia ▁mako ti ▁yao ▁ya ▁ibada , ▁waka wa peleka ▁nje ▁ya ▁kambi , ▁kama ▁Mose ▁alivyo am uru . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ndipo ▁Mose ▁akam wambia ▁Aroni ▁pamoja ▁na ▁wana we , ▁Ele az ari ▁na ▁Ith amari , ▁" M si fun ue ▁vich wa ▁vy enu ▁wala ▁ms irar ue ▁mava zi ▁yenu , ▁la ▁si vyo ▁mt aku fa ▁na ▁Bwana ▁ata ikas ir ikia ▁jum uiya ▁nzima . ▁Lakini ▁ndugu ▁zenu , ▁nyumba ▁yote ▁ya ▁Israeli , ▁wanaweza ▁kuwa ombo le zea ▁wale ▁ambao ▁Bwana ▁ame wa ang amiza ▁kwa ▁moto . </s> swh_Latn
▁M sit oke ▁nje ▁ya ▁ing ilio ▁la ▁H ema ▁la ▁Kuk utan ia , ▁la ▁si vyo ▁mt aku fa , ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁mafuta ▁ya ▁Bwana ▁ya ▁up ako ▁yako ▁juu ▁yenu . " ▁Hivyo ▁waka fanya ▁kama ▁vile ▁Mose ▁ali vy osema . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kisha ▁Bwana ▁akam wambia ▁Aroni , </s> swh_Latn
▁" We we ▁na ▁wanao ▁ms iny we ▁m vinyo ▁wala ▁kiny waji ▁king ine ▁kilicho ch ach uka ▁wakati ▁mw ing iapo ▁katika ▁H ema ▁la ▁Kuk utan ia , ▁la ▁si vyo ▁mt aku fa . ▁Hili ▁lit akuwa ▁A gi zo ▁la ▁kud umu ▁kwa ▁vi zazi ▁vi ja vyo . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ni ▁lazima ▁mt engan ishe ▁kilicho ▁kit akatifu ▁na ▁kile ▁kilicho ▁cha ▁kawaida , ▁kati ▁ya ▁yaliyo ▁naj isi ▁na ▁yaliyo ▁safi , </s> swh_Latn

▁Mose ▁akam wambia ▁Aroni ▁pamoja ▁na ▁wana we ▁wali os alia , ▁Ele az ari ▁na ▁Ith amari , ▁" Ch uku eni ▁sadaka ▁ya ▁naf aka ▁iliyo baki ▁kutoka ▁sadaka ▁ziliz otolewa ▁kwa ▁Bwana ▁kwa ▁moto , ▁mu ile ▁hapo ▁k ando ▁ya ▁mad haba hu ▁ikiwa ▁ime anda liwa ▁bila ▁cha chu , ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁ni ▁takatifu ▁sana . </s> swh_Latn
▁M ta ila ▁katika ▁mahali ▁pat akatifu ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁ni ▁fungu ▁l enu ▁na ▁fungu ▁la ▁wana ▁wenu ▁la ▁sadaka ▁ziliz otolewa ▁kwa ▁Bwana ▁kwa ▁moto , ▁kwa ▁maana ▁hivyo ▁ndivyo ▁nili vyo am ri wa . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁wewe ▁na ▁wanao ▁na ▁binti ▁zako ▁mwa weza ▁kula ▁kid ari ▁kile ▁kilicho inu liwa ▁na ▁paja ▁lile ▁lilil otolewa . ▁M ta vila ▁mahali ▁safi ▁pa ▁kawaida ▁ya ▁ibada ; ▁mme pewa ▁wewe ▁na ▁watoto ▁wako ▁kuwa ▁fungu ▁l enu ▁la ▁sadaka ▁za ▁amani ▁za ▁Waisraeli . </s> swh_Latn
▁Pa ja ▁lile ▁lilil otolewa ▁na ▁kid ari ▁kile ▁kilicho inu liwa ▁lazima ▁vi let we ▁pamoja ▁na ▁sehemu ▁za ▁mafuta ▁ya ▁sadaka ▁za ▁kut ekete zwa ▁kwa ▁moto , ▁ili ▁ku inu liwa ▁mbele ▁za ▁Bwana ▁kama ▁sadaka ▁ya ▁ku inu liwa . ▁Hili ▁lit akuwa ▁fungu ▁lako ▁la ▁kawaida ▁na ▁wanao , ▁kama ▁Bwana ▁alivyo agiza . ▁" Kwa ▁nini ▁ham kula ▁sadaka ▁ya ▁dhambi ▁katika ▁eneo ▁la ▁mahali ▁pat akatifu ? ▁Ni ▁takatifu ▁sana . ▁M li pewa ▁ninyi ▁ili ▁ku ondoa ▁hat ia ▁ya ▁jum uiya ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁kuwa fanyia ▁up atan isho ▁mbele ▁za ▁Bwana . </s> swh_Latn

▁Aroni ▁akam jibu ▁Mose , ▁" Le o ▁wan angu ▁wam etoa ▁sadaka ▁zao ▁za ▁dhambi ▁na ▁sadaka ▁zao ▁za ▁kut ekete zwa ▁mbele ▁za ▁Bwana , ▁lakini ▁mambo ▁kama ▁haya ▁yam enit okea ▁mimi . ▁Je , ▁Bwana ▁ang ep ende zwa ▁kama ▁ning ekuwa ▁nim ekula ▁sadaka ▁ya ▁dhambi ▁leo ?" </s> swh_Latn
▁Mose ▁ali pos ikia ▁haya , ▁akar idh ika . </s> swh_Latn
▁Bwana ▁akawa ambia ▁Mose ▁na ▁Aroni , </s> swh_Latn
▁" Wa ambi eni ▁Waisraeli : ▁' K ati ▁ya ▁wanyama ▁wote ▁wa ishi o ▁juu ▁ya ▁nchi , ▁hawa ▁ndio ▁mt aka o wala : </s> swh_Latn
▁Mwa weza ▁kula ▁m nyama ▁yeyote ▁mwenye ▁kw ato ▁zilizo ga wany ika ▁sehemu ▁mbili ▁na ▁ambaye ▁hu che ua . </s> swh_Latn
▁" ▁' Kuna ▁wanyama ▁wengine ▁ambao ▁hu che ua ▁tu ▁au ▁wenye ▁kw ato ▁zilizo ga wany ika ▁tu , ▁lakini ▁hao ▁kamwe ▁msi wale . ▁Ng amia ▁ingawa ▁hu che ua ▁hana ▁kw ato ▁zilizo ga wany ika ; ▁kwa ▁kawaida ▁ya ▁ibada ▁hiyo ▁ni ▁naj isi ▁kwenu . </s> swh_Latn
▁P elele ▁ingawa ▁hu che ua ▁hana ▁kw ato ▁zilizo ga wany ika ; ▁huyo ▁ni ▁naj isi ▁kwenu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Sung ura ▁ingawa ▁hu che ua ▁hana ▁kw ato ▁zilizo ga wany ika ; ▁huyo ▁ni ▁naj isi ▁kwenu . </s> swh_Latn

▁Kam we ▁m sile ▁nyama ▁yao ▁wala ▁kug usa ▁mizo ga ▁yao ; ▁wao ▁ni ▁naj isi ▁kwenu . </s> swh_Latn
▁" ▁' K uhusu ▁vi umbe ▁wote ▁wanao ishi ▁ndani ▁ya ▁maji ▁ya ▁bahari ▁na ▁vij ito , ▁m tak ula ▁wale ▁wote ▁wenye ▁mape zi ▁na ▁mag amba . </s> swh_Latn

▁Nao ▁wat akuwa ▁mach uk izo ▁kwenu . ▁M sile ▁nyama ▁yao , ▁nayo ▁mizo ga ▁yao ▁itakuwa ▁mach uk izo . </s> swh_Latn
▁Cho cho te ▁kinacho ishi ▁ndani ▁ya ▁maji ▁ambacho ▁hak ina ▁mape zi ▁na ▁mag amba ▁kit akuwa ▁ch uk izo ▁kwenu . </s> swh_Latn
▁" ▁' Wa fuata o ▁ndio ▁ndege ▁wataka okuwa ▁mach uk izo ▁kwenu , ▁hivyo ▁msi wale ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁ni ▁ch uk izo : ▁tai , ▁fur uk ombe , ▁kip ungu , </s> swh_Latn

▁" ▁' W ad udu ▁wote ▁war uka o ▁ambao ▁hut embea ▁kwa ▁miguu ▁minne ▁wat akuwa ▁ch uk izo ▁kwenu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁wako ▁vi umbe ▁wenye ▁ma bawa ▁ambao ▁hut embea ▁kwa ▁miguu ▁minne ▁mt aka o wala : ▁wale ▁wenye ▁vi fundo ▁katika ▁miguu ▁yao ▁ya ▁kur ukar uka ▁juu ▁ya ▁ardhi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Mi ongoni ▁mwa ▁hawa , ▁m tak ula ▁nz ige ▁wa ▁aina ▁zote , ▁sen ene , ▁par are ▁au ▁pan zi . </s> swh_Latn

▁" ▁' M taj ina jisi ▁kwa ▁wanyama ▁hawa . ▁Ye yote ▁agus aye ▁mizo ga ▁yao ▁atakuwa ▁naj isi ▁mpaka ▁ji oni . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ye yote ▁atak aye beba ▁mizo ga ▁ya ▁vi umbe ▁hawa ▁ni ▁lazima ▁af ue ▁nguo ▁zake , ▁naye ▁atakuwa ▁naj isi ▁mpaka ▁ji oni . </s> swh_Latn
▁" ▁' K ila ▁m nyama ▁mwenye ▁ukw ato ▁ulio ach ana ▁lakini ▁ha uku ga wany ika ▁kabisa , ▁au ▁yule ▁asiye che ua , ▁huyo ▁ni ▁naj isi ▁kwenu ; ▁yeyote ▁agus aye ▁m zo ga ▁wowote ▁wa ▁hao ▁atakuwa ▁naj isi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Mi ongoni ▁mwa ▁wanyama ▁wote ▁wat embe ao ▁kwa ▁miguu ▁minne , ▁wale ▁wat embe ao ▁kwa ▁vit anga ▁vya o ▁ni ▁naj isi ▁kwenu ; ▁yeyote ▁agus aye ▁mizo ga ▁yao ▁atakuwa ▁naj isi ▁mpaka ▁ji oni . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ye yote ▁atak aye beba ▁mizo ga ▁yao ▁ni ▁lazima ▁af ue ▁nguo ▁zake , ▁naye ▁atakuwa ▁naj isi ▁mpaka ▁ji oni . ▁W any ama ▁hawa ▁ni ▁naj isi ▁kwenu . </s> swh_Latn
▁" ▁' K uhusu ▁wanyama ▁wat amba ao ▁juu ▁ya ▁ardhi , ▁hawa ▁ni ▁naj isi ▁kwenu : ▁ki che che , ▁p anya , ▁aina ▁yoyote ▁ya ▁mij usi ▁mik ubwa , </s> swh_Latn
▁gur uguru , ▁k enge , ▁mij usi ▁ya ▁ukut ani , ▁gor omo e ▁na ▁kin yonga . </s> swh_Latn
▁Hao ▁wote ▁wat amba ao ▁juu ▁ya ▁ardhi ▁ni ▁naj isi ▁kwenu . ▁Ye yote ▁agus aye ▁mizo ga ▁yao ▁atakuwa ▁naj isi ▁mpaka ▁ji oni . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ikiwa ▁mmoja ▁wao ▁at aku fa ▁na ▁ku ang ukia ▁juu ▁ya ▁kitu ▁fulani , ▁ch ombo ▁hicho , ▁hata ▁kiki wa ▁cha ▁matumizi ▁gani , ▁kit akuwa ▁naj isi , ▁ki we ▁kim eteng ene zwa ▁kwa ▁mti , ▁nguo , ▁ngozi ▁au ▁gun ia . ▁Ki weke ▁ndani ▁ya ▁maji ; ▁kit akuwa ▁naj isi ▁mpaka ▁ji oni , ▁kisha ▁kit akuwa ▁safi ▁tena . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ikiwa ▁mmoja ▁wa ▁wanyama ▁aliy eku fa ▁ata ang ukia ▁ndani ▁ya ▁ch ungu , ▁kila ▁kilich omo ▁katika ▁ch ungu ▁hicho ▁kit akuwa ▁naj isi , ▁nawe ▁ni ▁lazima ▁uv un je ▁ch ungu ▁hicho . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ch akula ▁chochote ▁ambacho ▁cha weza ▁kuli wa ▁lakini ▁kika wa ▁kime ingia ▁maji ▁kutoka ▁kwenye ▁ch ungu ▁hicho ▁ni ▁naj isi , ▁na ▁kitu ▁chochote ▁cha ▁maj ima ji ▁ambacho ▁cha weza ▁kuny weka ▁kutoka ▁kwenye ▁ch ungu ▁hicho ▁ni ▁naj isi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Cho cho te ▁ambacho ▁m zo ga ▁wa ▁mmoja wapo ▁uta ang ukia ▁kit akuwa ▁naj isi . ▁J iko ▁au ▁ch ungu ▁cha ▁kup ikia ▁ni ▁lazima ▁ki vun jwe . ▁Ni ▁naj isi , ▁nawe ▁ni ▁lazima ▁u vih esa bu ▁kuwa ▁naj isi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁chem ch emi ▁au ▁kis ima , ▁mahali ▁pa ▁ku cho ta ▁maji , ▁pat akuwa ▁safi , ▁lakini ▁yeyote ▁at akay eg usa ▁moja ▁ya ▁mizo ga ▁hii ▁ni ▁naj isi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kama ▁m zo ga ▁uki anguka ▁juu ▁ya ▁mb egu ▁zo zote ▁ambazo ▁ni ▁za ▁kupanda , ▁zina baki ▁safi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁kama ▁mb egu ▁im etiwa ▁maji ▁na ▁m zo ga ▁uka anguka ▁juu ▁yake , ▁hiyo ▁mb egu ▁ni ▁naj isi ▁kwenu . </s> swh_Latn
▁" ▁' K ama ▁m nyama ▁ambaye ▁m nar uh usiwa ▁kum la ▁aki fa , ▁yeyote ▁atak aye ug usa ▁m zo ga ▁wake ▁atakuwa ▁naj isi ▁mpaka ▁ji oni . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ye yote ▁at akay ekula ▁sehemu ▁ya ▁m zo ga ▁huo ▁ni ▁lazima ▁af ue ▁nguo ▁zake , ▁naye ▁atakuwa ▁naj isi ▁mpaka ▁ji oni . ▁Ye yote ▁atak aye beba ▁m zo ga ▁huo ▁ni ▁lazima ▁af ue ▁nguo ▁zake , ▁naye ▁atakuwa ▁naj isi ▁mpaka ▁ji oni . </s> swh_Latn
▁" ▁' K ila ▁ki umbe ▁kit amba acho ▁juu ▁ya ▁ardhi ▁ni ▁ch uk izo ; ▁kisi liwe . </s> swh_Latn

▁" ▁' K ila ▁tand iko ▁ambalo ▁mtu ▁huyo ▁ata lika lia ▁wakati ▁wa ▁kupanda ▁m nyama ▁lit akuwa ▁naj isi , </s> swh_Latn

▁Ikiwa ▁binti ▁wa ▁ku hani ▁ame ole wa ▁na ▁mtu ▁asiye ▁ku hani , ▁binti ▁huyo ▁har uh usiwi ▁kula ▁chochote ▁cha ▁mat oleo ▁mat akatifu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁ikiwa ▁binti ▁wa ▁ku hani ▁am ekuwa ▁mj ane ▁au ▁ame pewa ▁talaka , ▁naye ▁hana ▁watoto , ▁na ▁ak aru di ▁kuishi ▁na ▁jamaa ▁ya ▁baba ▁yake ▁kama ▁wakati ▁wa ▁us ich ana ▁wake , ▁binti ▁huyo ▁anaweza ▁kula ▁chakula ▁cha ▁baba ▁yake . ▁Hata ▁hivyo , ▁mtu ▁asi yer uh usiwa ▁ha wezi ▁kula ▁chochote ▁katika ▁chakula ▁hiki . </s> swh_Latn
▁" ▁' I kiwa ▁mtu ▁yeyote ▁amek ula ▁sadaka ▁takatifu ▁kwa ▁makosa , ▁lazima ▁ato e ▁malipo ▁ya ▁sadaka ▁hiyo ▁kwa ▁ku hani ▁na ▁kuongeza ▁sehemu ▁ya ▁tano ▁ya ▁thamani ▁ya ▁sadaka ▁hiyo . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kam we ▁maku hani ▁wasi ina jisi ▁sadaka ▁takatifu ▁ambayo ▁Waisraeli ▁wame itoa ▁kwa ▁Bwana </s> swh_Latn
▁kwa ▁ku war uhusu ▁ku zila ▁sadaka ▁hizo ▁takatifu , ▁na ▁hivyo ▁kuwa le tea ▁hat ia ▁ya ▁ku dai wa ▁malipo . ▁Mimi ▁ndimi ▁Bwana ▁ni wa fany aye ▁wat akatifu .' ▁" </s> swh_Latn
▁Bwana ▁akam wambia ▁Mose , </s> swh_Latn
▁" S ema ▁na ▁Aroni ▁na ▁wana we , ▁na ▁Waisraeli ▁wote ▁uwa ambie : ▁' I kiwa ▁mmoja ▁wenu , ▁aliye ▁Mwis ra eli ▁au ▁mg eni ▁anaye ishi ▁katika ▁nchi ▁ya ▁Israeli , ▁at atoa ▁mat oleo ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁sadaka ▁ya ▁kut ekete zwa ▁kwa ▁moto ▁kwa ▁Bwana , ▁iwe ▁kutimiza ▁n adh iri ▁au ▁kuwa ▁sadaka ▁ya ▁hi ari , </s> swh_Latn
▁lazima ▁m toe ▁m nyama ▁d ume ▁asiye ▁na ▁dos ari , ▁akiwa ▁ng ʼ ombe , ▁mbu zi ▁au ▁kondo o , ▁ili ▁awe ze ▁kukuba lika ▁kwa ▁nia ba ▁yako . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kam we ▁us ito e ▁kitu ▁chochote ▁chenye ▁dos ari ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁hak it akubali wa ▁kwa ▁nia ba ▁yako . </s> swh_Latn
▁Mtu ▁yeyote ▁ale ta po ▁sadaka ▁ya ▁amani ▁kwa ▁Bwana ▁kutoka ▁kundi ▁la ▁ng ʼ ombe ▁au ▁mbu zi ▁ili ▁kutimiza ▁n adh iri ▁maal um ▁au ▁sadaka ▁ya ▁hi ari , ▁lazima ▁sadaka ▁hiyo ▁isi we ▁na ▁dos ari ▁au ▁waa ▁ili ▁iku bali ke . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kam we ▁us im to lee ▁Bwana ▁m nyama ▁aliye ▁ki pofu , ▁aliye jeru hiwa ▁wala ▁aliye ▁ki lema , ▁au ▁chochote ▁kilicho ▁na ▁u vim be , ▁au ▁chenye ▁u pele ▁au ▁vid onda ▁vina vy otoka ▁usaha . ▁Kam we ▁chochote ▁cha ▁aina ▁hii ▁kisi wek we ▁juu ▁ya ▁mad haba hu ▁kuwa ▁sadaka ▁iliy otolewa ▁kwa ▁Bwana ▁ya ▁kut ekete zwa ▁kwa ▁moto . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁wa weza ▁uk atoa ▁ng ʼ ombe ▁au ▁kondo o ▁mwenye ▁ki lema ▁au ▁ali yed umaa ▁kama ▁sadaka ▁ya ▁hi ari , ▁lakini ▁hii ▁hait akuba lika ▁kuwa ▁sadaka ▁ya ▁kutimiza ▁n adh iri . </s> swh_Latn

▁To eni ▁pamoja ▁na ▁hiyo ▁mik ate ▁wana - k ondo o ▁saba , ▁kila ▁mmoja ▁wa ▁mwaka ▁mmoja ▁asiye ▁na ▁dos ari , ▁na ▁fa hali ▁mch anga , ▁na ▁kondo o ▁d ume ▁wawili . ▁Wat akuwa ▁sadaka ▁ya ▁kut ekete zwa ▁kwa ▁moto ▁iliy otolewa ▁kwa ▁Bwana , ▁pamoja ▁na ▁sadaka ▁za ▁naf aka ▁na ▁sadaka ▁za ▁viny waji , ▁sadaka ▁iliy otolewa ▁kwa ▁moto ▁yenye ▁har ufu ▁nzuri ▁ya ▁kump endeza ▁Bwana . </s> swh_Latn

▁Nje ▁ya ▁pa zia ▁la ▁Us hu huda ▁ndani ▁ya ▁H ema ▁la ▁Kuk utan ia , ▁Aroni ▁ata zi washa ▁taa ▁mbele ▁za ▁Bwana ▁kuan zia ▁ji oni ▁hadi ▁asubuhi ▁bila ▁ku zima . ▁Hili ▁lit akuwa ▁agi zo ▁la ▁kud umu ▁kwa ▁vi zazi ▁vi ja vyo . </s> swh_Latn
▁Taa ▁zilizo ▁juu ▁ya ▁kin ara ▁cha ▁dhahabu ▁safi ▁mbele ▁za ▁Bwana ▁lazima ▁zih ud umi we ▁daima . </s> swh_Latn
▁" Ch ukua ▁unga ▁la ini , ▁u oke ▁mik ate ▁kumi ▁na ▁miwili , ▁uk it umia ▁sehemu ▁mbili ▁za ▁kumi ▁za ▁efa ▁za ▁unga ▁kwa ▁kila ▁mkate . </s> swh_Latn
▁I weke ▁katika ▁mist ari ▁miwili , ▁kila ▁m stari ▁mik ate ▁sita , ▁ui weke ▁mbele ▁za ▁Bwana ▁juu ▁ya ▁meza ▁ili yot engene zwa ▁kwa ▁dhahabu ▁safi . </s> swh_Latn
▁K ando ▁ya ▁kila ▁m stari , ▁weka ▁uv umba ▁safi ▁kama ▁sehemu ▁ya ▁kumb ukumbu ▁ili ▁kuwak ilisha ▁mik ate ▁kuwa ▁sadaka ▁iliy otolewa ▁kwa ▁Bwana ▁kwa ▁kut ekete zwa ▁kwa ▁moto . </s> swh_Latn
▁Mik ate ▁hii ▁ita wekwa ▁mbele ▁za ▁Bwana ▁kila ▁wakati , ▁Sabato ▁baada ▁ya ▁Sabato , ▁kwa ▁nia ba ▁ya ▁Waisraeli , ▁kuwa ▁Ag ano ▁la ▁kud umu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Hii ▁ni ▁mali ▁ya ▁Aroni ▁na ▁wana we , ▁wataka o ila ▁katika ▁mahali ▁pat akatifu , ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁ni ▁sehemu ▁takatifu ▁sana ▁ya ▁fungu ▁lao ▁la ▁kawaida ▁la ▁sadaka ▁iliy otolewa ▁kwa ▁Bwana ▁kwa ▁kut ekete zwa ▁kwa ▁moto . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Basi ▁mwana ▁wa ▁mama ▁Mwis ra eli ▁na ▁baba ▁M mis ri ▁alik wenda ▁miongoni ▁mwa ▁Waisraeli , ▁nayo ▁map ig ano ▁yak at okea ▁ndani ▁ya ▁kambi ▁kati ▁yake ▁na ▁Mwis ra eli . </s> swh_Latn
▁Hu yu ▁mwana ▁wa ▁mwanamke ▁Mwis ra eli ▁aka liku f uru ▁Jina ▁la ▁Bwana ▁kwa ▁kula ani ; ▁kwa ▁hiyo ▁wakam leta ▁kwa ▁Mose . ▁( J ina ▁la ▁mama ▁yake ▁ali itwa ▁Sh elom ithi ▁binti ▁wa ▁Dib ri , ▁wa ▁kabila ▁la ▁Dani .) </s> swh_Latn
▁Nao ▁wakam weka ▁ma hab usu ▁mpaka ▁mapenzi ▁ya ▁Bwana ▁yawe ▁wazi ▁kwao . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ndipo ▁Bwana ▁akam wambia ▁Mose : </s> swh_Latn
▁" M ch ukue ▁huyo ▁aliy eku f uru ▁nje ▁ya ▁kambi . ▁Wale ▁wote ▁wali oms ikia ▁ak iku f uru ▁wata weka ▁mikono ▁juu ▁ya ▁kichwa ▁chake , ▁kisha ▁kus anyiko ▁lote ▁lit ampi ga ▁mawe . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wa ambie ▁Waisraeli : ▁' I kiwa ▁mtu ▁yeyote ▁atam la ani ▁Mungu ▁wake , ▁atakuwa ▁na ▁hat ia ▁kwa ▁u ovu ▁wake ; </s> swh_Latn
▁yeyote ▁at akay eku f uru ▁Jina ▁la ▁Bwana ▁ni ▁lazima ▁aua we . ▁Kus anyiko ▁lote ▁lit ampi ga ▁kwa ▁mawe . ▁Iwe ▁ni ▁mg eni ▁au ▁m zawa , ▁atak apo liku f uru ▁Jina ▁la ▁Bwana , ▁ni ▁lazima ▁aua we . </s> swh_Latn
▁" ▁' K ama ▁mtu ▁yeyote ▁at amu ua ▁mtu ▁mwingine , ▁ni ▁lazima ▁aua we . </s> swh_Latn
▁Mtu ▁yeyote ▁au aye ▁m nyama ▁wa ▁mtu ▁mwingine ▁lazima ▁af idie , ▁uhai ▁kwa ▁uhai . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ikiwa ▁mtu ▁yeyote ▁atam jeru hi ▁jir ani ▁yake , ▁chochote ▁ali chom ten da ▁naye ▁atat ende wa : </s> swh_Latn
▁iwa po ▁am em vun ja ▁m fupa ▁ata vun jwa ▁m fupa , ▁ji cho ▁kwa ▁ji cho , ▁jino ▁kwa ▁jino . ▁Kama ▁ali vy om jeru hi ▁mwen zake , ▁vi vyo ▁hivyo ▁ndivyo ▁at aka vyo jeru hiwa . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ye yote ▁au aye ▁m nyama ▁wa ▁mtu ▁lazima ▁ali pe ▁f idia , ▁lakini ▁yeyote ▁au aye ▁mtu , ▁lazima ▁aua we . </s> swh_Latn
▁Mt akuwa ▁na ▁sheria ▁iyo ▁hiyo ▁kwa ▁mg eni ▁na ▁kwa ▁m zawa . ▁Mimi ▁ndimi ▁Bwana ▁Mungu ▁wenu .' ▁" </s> swh_Latn
▁Kisha ▁Mose ▁akasema ▁na ▁Waisraeli , ▁nao ▁wakam chukua ▁yule ▁aliy eku f uru ▁nje ▁ya ▁kambi ▁na ▁kum piga ▁mawe . ▁Waisraeli ▁waka fanya ▁kama ▁Bwana ▁ali vy om wagi za ▁Mose . </s> swh_Latn
▁Bwana ▁akam wambia ▁Mose ▁katika ▁M lima ▁Sinai , </s> swh_Latn
▁" S ema ▁na ▁Waisraeli ▁uwa ambie : ▁' M tak apo ingia ▁katika ▁nchi ▁nin ayo wa pa ▁ninyi , ▁nchi ▁yenye we ▁ni ▁lazima ▁ish ike ▁Sabato ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁Bwana . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁miaka ▁sita ▁mta panda ▁ma zao ▁katika ▁mash amba ▁yenu , ▁nanyi ▁kwa ▁miaka ▁sita ▁mta ikata ▁mi za bibu ▁yenu ▁mata wi ▁na ▁kuv una ▁ma zao ▁yake . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁mwaka ▁wa ▁saba ▁nchi ▁lazima ▁iwe ▁na ▁Sabato ▁ya ▁map um ziko , ▁Sabato ▁kwa ▁Bwana . ▁M si pande ▁mb egu ▁katika ▁mash amba ▁yenu , ▁wala ▁m sik ate ▁mi za bibu ▁yenu ▁mata wi . </s> swh_Latn
▁M siv une ▁na ▁kuweka ▁aki ba ▁kinacho ota ▁chenye we , ▁wala ▁kuv una ▁na ▁kus indika ▁zabi bu ▁ambayo ▁ham ku hud umia ▁mash amba ▁yake . ▁Nchi ▁lazima ▁iwe ▁na ▁mwaka ▁wa ▁map um ziko . </s> swh_Latn
▁Cho cho te ▁nchi ▁ito acho ▁katika ▁mwaka ▁wa ▁Sabato ▁kit akuwa ▁chakula ▁ch enu ▁wenyewe , ▁watumishi ▁wenu ▁wa ▁ki ume ▁na ▁wa ▁kike , ▁mf any akazi ▁aliye aj iriwa , ▁na ▁mkazi ▁wa ▁muda ▁anaye ishi ▁miongoni ▁mwen u , </s> swh_Latn
▁vile vile ▁mal isho ▁ya ▁mif ugo ▁yenu ▁na ▁wanyama ▁pori ▁katika ▁nchi ▁yenu . ▁Cho cho te ▁nchi ▁it aka cho zal isha ▁kina weza ▁kuli wa . </s> swh_Latn
▁" ▁' H esa bu ▁Sabato ▁saba ▁za ▁miaka , ▁yaani ▁miaka ▁saba ▁mara ▁saba , ▁ili ▁Sabato ▁saba ▁za ▁miaka ▁utakuwa ▁muda ▁wa ▁miaka ▁aro ba ini ▁na ▁tisa . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ndipo ▁tar umb eta ▁ita p igwa ▁kila ▁mahali ▁katika ▁siku ▁ya ▁kumi ▁ya ▁mwezi ▁wa ▁saba . ▁Katika ▁Siku ▁ya ▁Up atan isho , ▁pi ga ▁tar umb eta ▁katika ▁nchi ▁yako ▁yote . </s> swh_Latn
▁Mwaka ▁wa ▁ham sini ▁mta uw eka ▁wak fu ▁na ▁kut angaza ▁uhuru ▁katika ▁nchi ▁kwa ▁waka zi ▁wake ▁wote . ▁It akuwa ▁ni ▁yu bile ▁kwenu ; ▁kila ▁mmoja ▁wenu ▁ata ir udia ▁mali ▁ya ▁jamaa ▁yake , ▁na ▁kila ▁mmoja ▁kurudi ▁kwenye ▁uko o ▁wake . </s> swh_Latn
▁Mwaka ▁wa ▁ham sini ▁utakuwa ▁yu bile ▁kwenu , ▁msi pande ▁wala ▁m siv une ▁kile ▁ki ota cho ▁chenye we , ▁au ▁kuv una ▁zabi bu ▁zisi zo hud umiwa . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁kuwa ▁ni ▁yu bile , ▁nayo ▁itakuwa ▁takatifu ▁kwenu ; ▁m tak ula ▁tu ▁kile ▁kilich otoka ▁moja ▁kwa ▁moja ▁mash ambani . </s> swh_Latn
▁" ▁' Kat ika ▁huu ▁Mwaka ▁wa ▁Yu bile , ▁kila ▁mmoja ▁at aru di ▁kwenye ▁mali ▁yake ▁mwenyewe . </s> swh_Latn
▁" ▁' I kiwa ▁uta uza ▁ardhi ▁kwa ▁mmoja ▁wa ▁waza wa ▁wa ▁nchi ▁yako , ▁au ▁uk in unua ▁ardhi ▁kutoka ▁kwake , ▁mmoja ▁asim pun je ▁mwingine . </s> swh_Latn
▁Utan unua ▁ardhi ▁kwa ▁m zawa ▁wa ▁nchi ▁yako ▁kwa ▁mis ingi ▁ya ▁hesa bu ▁ya ▁miaka ▁baada ▁ya ▁Yu bile . ▁Naye ▁ata i uza ▁kwako ▁kwa ▁mis ingi ▁ya ▁hesa bu ▁ya ▁miaka ▁iliyo baki ▁kwa ▁kuv una ▁mav uno . </s> swh_Latn
▁Mi aka ▁inap okuwa ▁mingi , ▁uta ongeza ▁bei , ▁nayo ▁miaka ▁ikiwa ▁mich ache , ▁utap unguza ▁bei , ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁kile ▁anach oku uz ia ▁kwa ▁hakika ▁ni ▁hesa bu ▁ya ▁ma zao . </s> swh_Latn
▁Mmo ja ▁asim pun je ▁mwingine , ▁bali ▁ut am cha ▁Mungu ▁wako . ▁Mimi ▁ndimi ▁Bwana ▁Mungu ▁wako . </s> swh_Latn
▁" ▁' Fu at eni ▁amri ▁zangu , ▁mwe ▁wa angalifu ▁kuti i ▁amri ▁zangu , ▁nanyi ▁mta ishi ▁salama ▁katika ▁nchi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kisha ▁nchi ▁ita zaa ▁matunda ▁yake , ▁nanyi ▁m tak ula ▁na ▁kus hiba ▁na ▁kuishi ▁humo ▁kwa ▁salama . </s> swh_Latn
▁Mwa weza ▁ku uliza , ▁" T ut akula ▁nini ▁katika ▁mwaka ▁wa ▁saba ▁ikiwa ▁h atuta panda ▁wala ▁kuv una ▁ma zao ▁yetu ?" </s> swh_Latn
▁N ita wa pe leke eni ▁baraka ▁ya ▁pekee ▁katika ▁mwaka ▁wa ▁sita , ▁kwamba ▁nchi ▁ita zal isha ▁ma zao ▁ya ▁kutosha ▁kwa ▁miaka ▁mitatu . </s> swh_Latn
▁M nap op anda ▁mwaka ▁wa ▁nane , ▁m tak ula ▁mav uno ▁ya ▁miaka ▁iliyopita . ▁Pia ▁mta endelea ▁kuyala ▁ma zao ▁hayo ▁hadi ▁mv une ▁mav uno ▁ya ▁mwaka ▁wa ▁tisa . </s> swh_Latn
▁" ▁' K amwe ▁ardhi ▁isi uz we ▁kwa ▁mk ataba ▁wa ▁kud umu , ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁nchi ▁ni ▁mali ▁yangu , ▁nanyi ▁ni ▁wag eni ▁na ▁wap anga ji ▁wangu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Katika ▁nchi ▁yote ▁m tak ay osh ika ▁kuwa ▁mil ki ▁yenu , ▁ni ▁lazima ▁m toe ▁uk ombo zi ▁wa ▁ardhi . </s> swh_Latn
▁" ▁' I kiwa ▁mmoja ▁wa ▁waza wa ▁wa ▁nchi ▁yako ▁am ekuwa ▁mask ini ▁na ▁aka uza ▁baadhi ▁ya ▁mali ▁yake , ▁ndugu ▁yake ▁wa ▁karibu ▁at akuja ▁na ▁kuk ombo a ▁kile ▁ndugu ▁yako ▁ali ch oki uza . </s> swh_Latn
▁I wapo ▁mtu ▁huyo ▁hana ▁jamaa ▁wa ▁karibu ▁wa ▁kuk ombo a ▁mali ▁hiyo ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁yake , ▁lakini ▁yeye ▁mwenyewe ▁aka fanikiwa ▁na ▁kupata ▁mali ▁it osh ayo ▁ku ik ombo a , </s> swh_Latn
▁ata amua ▁tena ▁thamani ▁yake ▁kwa ▁miaka ▁tangu ▁ali poi uza , ▁na ▁kur ud isha ▁kiasi ▁kilich obaki ▁cha ▁thamani ▁kwa ▁mtu ▁ambaye ▁alikuwa ▁am em uu zia ▁mali ▁hiyo , ▁naye ▁ata weza ▁ku ir udia ▁mali ▁yake . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁kama ▁hat apata ▁njia ▁ya ▁kum lipa ▁mn unu zi , ▁ile ▁mali ▁ali you za ▁i tab aki ▁kum ili kiwa ▁na ▁mn unu zi ▁mpaka ▁Mwaka ▁wa ▁Yu bile . ▁Mali ▁hiyo ▁it ar ud ishwa ▁mwaka ▁wa ▁Yu bile , ▁naye ▁ata weza ▁ku ir udia ▁mali ▁yake . </s> swh_Latn
▁" ▁' I kiwa ▁mtu ▁atau za ▁nyumba ▁iliyo ▁ndani ▁ya ▁mji ▁ulio zung ukwa ▁kwa ▁uku ta , ▁yeye ▁an ayo ▁haki ▁ya ▁ku ik ombo a ▁mwaka ▁mzima ▁baada ▁ya ▁mau zo ▁ya ▁hiyo ▁nyumba . ▁Wakati ▁huo ▁anaweza ▁ku ik ombo a . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ikiwa ▁ha ik uk ombo lewa ▁kabla ▁ya ▁mwaka ▁mmoja ▁kamili ▁kupita , ▁nyumba ▁iliyo ▁ndani ▁ya ▁mji ▁ulio zung ukwa ▁kwa ▁uku ta ▁itakuwa ▁mali ▁ya ▁kud umu ▁ya ▁mn unu zi ▁na ▁wa zao ▁wake . ▁Ha itar ud ishwa ▁mwaka ▁wa ▁Yu bile . </s> swh_Latn

▁" ▁' Wala wi ▁siku ▁zote ▁wana ▁haki ▁ya ▁kuk ombo a ▁nyumba ▁zao ▁katika ▁miji ▁ya ▁Wala wi ▁wan ayo im iliki . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁hiyo ▁mali ▁ya ▁M la wi ▁inaweza ▁kuk ombo lewa , ▁yaani ▁nyumba ▁iliy ou zwa ▁katika ▁mji ▁wowote ▁wanao ush iki lia ▁it ar ud ishwa ▁mwaka ▁wa ▁Yu bile , ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁nyumba ▁zilizo ▁katika ▁miji ▁ya ▁Wala wi ▁ni ▁mali ▁yao ▁miongoni ▁mwa ▁Waisraeli . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁nchi ▁ya ▁mal isho ▁iliyo ▁mali ▁ya ▁miji ▁yao ▁kamwe ▁isi uz we , ▁ni ▁mil ki ▁yao ▁ya ▁kud umu . </s> swh_Latn
▁" ▁' I kiwa ▁mmoja ▁wa ▁waza wa ▁wa ▁nchi ▁yako ▁am ekuwa ▁mask ini , ▁naye ▁akash indwa ▁kuj iteg emeza ▁mwenyewe ▁katikati ▁yako , ▁msa idie ▁kama ▁vile ▁ambavyo ▁unge lim saidia ▁mg eni ▁au ▁kama ▁mkazi ▁wa ▁muda , ▁ili ▁awe ze ▁kuendelea ▁kuishi ▁katikati ▁yako . </s> swh_Latn
▁U sich ukue ▁riba ▁wala ▁faida ▁yoyote ▁kutoka ▁kwake , ▁bali ▁ut am w ogopa ▁Mungu ▁wako , ▁ili ▁m zawa ▁wa ▁nchi ▁yako ▁awe ze ▁kuendelea ▁kuishi ▁katikati ▁yako . </s> swh_Latn
▁U sim kop eshe ▁fedha ▁ili ▁ali pe ▁na ▁riba , ▁wala ▁us im uu zie ▁chakula ▁kwa ▁faida . </s> swh_Latn
▁Mimi ▁ndimi ▁Bwana ▁Mungu ▁wako , ▁ni liy eku leta ▁kutoka ▁nchi ▁ya ▁Misri ▁niku pe ▁nchi ▁ya ▁Kana ani , ▁nami ▁niwe ▁Mungu ▁wako . </s> swh_Latn
▁" ▁' I kiwa ▁mmoja ▁wa ▁waza wa ▁wa ▁nchi ▁yako ▁am ekuwa ▁mask ini ▁katikati ▁yako , ▁naye ▁aka ji uza ▁kwako , ▁us im fanye ▁atum ike ▁kama ▁mtum wa . </s> swh_Latn
▁At at ende wa ▁kama ▁mf any akazi ▁aliye aj iriwa , ▁au ▁kama ▁mkazi ▁wa ▁muda ▁katikati ▁yako , ▁naye ▁atat umika ▁mpaka ▁Mwaka ▁wa ▁Yu bile . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ndipo ▁yeye ▁na ▁watoto ▁wake ▁wata ach iwa , ▁naye ▁at aru di ▁kwa ▁watu ▁wa ▁uko o ▁wake , ▁na ▁kwenye ▁mali ▁ya ▁baba ▁zake . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁sababu ▁Waisraeli ▁ni ▁watumishi ▁wangu ▁ni lio wa leta ▁kutoka ▁nchi ▁ya ▁Misri , ▁kamwe ▁wasi uz we ▁kama ▁wat umwa . </s> swh_Latn
▁Usi wata wale ▁kwa ▁uk atili , ▁lakini ▁ut am cha ▁Mungu ▁wako . </s> swh_Latn
▁" ▁' Wat umwa ▁wako ▁wa ▁ki ume ▁na ▁wa ▁kike ▁wat at oka ▁katika ▁mataifa ▁yanay oku zung uka ; ▁kutoka ▁kwao ▁wa weza ▁kununua ▁wat umwa . </s> swh_Latn
▁Pia ▁wa weza ▁kununua ▁baadhi ▁ya ▁waka zi ▁wa ▁muda ▁wanao ishi ▁katikati ▁yako , ▁na ▁jamaa ▁ya ▁koo ▁zao ▁walio zaliwa ▁katika ▁nchi ▁yako , ▁nao ▁wat akuwa ▁mali ▁yako . </s> swh_Latn
▁Hao ▁wa weza ▁ku war ith isha ▁watoto ▁wako ▁kuwa ▁ur ithi ▁wao , ▁na ▁wanaweza ▁kuwa fanya ▁wat umwa ▁maisha ▁yao ▁yote , ▁lakini ▁usi wata wale ▁ndugu ▁zako ▁Waisraeli ▁kwa ▁uk atili . </s> swh_Latn
▁" ▁' I kiwa ▁mg eni ▁au ▁mkazi ▁wa ▁muda ▁katikati ▁yako ▁atakuwa ▁taj iri , ▁na ▁mmoja ▁wa ▁waza wa ▁wa ▁nchi ▁yako ▁akawa ▁mask ini , ▁naye ▁aka ji uza ▁kwa ▁yule ▁mg eni ▁anaye ishi ▁katikati ▁yako , ▁au ▁kwa ▁mmoja ▁wa ▁jamaa ▁wa ▁koo ▁za ▁wag eni , </s> swh_Latn
▁an ayo ▁haki ▁ya ▁kuk ombo lewa ▁baada ▁ya ▁kuji uza . ▁Mmo ja ▁wa ▁jamaa ▁zake ▁a weza ▁kum kom boa : </s> swh_Latn
▁Mj omba ▁wake , ▁au ▁bin amu ▁yake , ▁au ▁yeyote ▁aliye ▁ndugu ▁wa ▁damu ▁katika ▁uko o ▁wake ▁a weza ▁kum kom boa . ▁Au ▁ikiwa ▁ata fanikiwa , ▁anaweza ▁kuj ik ombo a ▁mwenyewe . </s> swh_Latn
▁Yeye ▁na ▁huyo ▁ali yem nun ua ▁wata h esa bu ▁muda ▁kuan zia ▁mwaka ▁ali oji uza ▁hadi ▁Mwaka ▁wa ▁Yu bile . ▁Ma hali ▁pa ▁kuan zia ▁bei ▁ya ▁ku ach iwa ▁kwake ▁it akad iriwa ▁kwa ▁uj ira ▁unao lip wa ▁mf any akazi ▁aliye aj iriwa ▁kwa ▁idadi ▁ya ▁hiyo ▁miaka . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ikiwa ▁ime baki ▁miaka ▁mingi , ▁ni ▁lazima ▁ata lip ia ▁uk ombo zi ▁wake ▁fungu ▁kubwa ▁la ▁bei ▁iliyo lip wa ▁kum nun ua ▁yeye . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ikiwa ▁miaka ▁iliyo baki ▁ni ▁mich ache ▁kufikia ▁Mwaka ▁wa ▁Yu bile , ▁ata fanya ▁hesa bu ▁yake , ▁naye ▁ata lipa ▁malipo ▁yanay osta hili ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁uk ombo zi ▁wake . </s> swh_Latn
▁At at ende wa ▁kama ▁mtu ▁wa ▁ku aj iriwa ▁mwaka ▁hadi ▁mwaka ; ▁lazima ▁u one ▁kwamba ▁yule ▁ali yem nun ua ▁ham ta wali ▁kwa ▁uk atili . </s> swh_Latn
▁" ▁' H ata ▁ikiwa ▁hak uk ombo lewa ▁kwa ▁njia ▁moja wapo ▁ya ▁hizi , ▁yeye ▁na ▁watoto ▁wake ▁wata ach iwa ▁katika ▁Mwaka ▁wa ▁Yu bile , </s> swh_Latn
▁kwa ▁maana ▁Waisraeli ▁ni ▁mali ▁yangu ▁kama ▁watumishi . ▁Wao ▁ni ▁watumishi ▁wangu , ▁ni lio w atoa ▁kutoka ▁nchi ▁ya ▁Misri . ▁Mimi ▁ndimi ▁Bwana ▁Mungu ▁wako . </s> swh_Latn
▁" ▁' M si jit engene zee ▁san amu ▁au ▁kusim am isha ▁k inya go ▁cha ▁kuch onga , ▁au ▁mn ara , ▁wala ▁ji we ▁la ▁ku ab udia , ▁na ▁pia ▁msi ji weke e ▁ji we ▁lililo ch ongwa ▁katika ▁nchi ▁yenu ▁na ▁kus uj udu ▁mbele ▁yake . ▁Mimi ▁ndimi ▁Bwana ▁Mungu ▁wenu . </s> swh_Latn
▁" ▁' Z ish ik eni ▁Sabato ▁zangu ▁na ▁kuh esh imu ▁mahali ▁pat akatifu ▁pangu . ▁Mimi ▁ndimi ▁Bwana . </s> swh_Latn
▁" ▁' I kiwa ▁mta fuata ▁amri ▁zangu ▁na ▁kuwa ▁wa angalifu ▁kuti i ▁maag izo ▁yangu , </s> swh_Latn
▁nita wany es hea ▁mvua ▁katika ▁maj ira ▁yake , ▁nayo ▁ardhi ▁it atoa ▁ma zao ▁yake , ▁na ▁miti ▁ya ▁mash ambani ▁ita zaa ▁matunda ▁yake . </s> swh_Latn

▁Bwana ▁akam wambia ▁Mose , </s> swh_Latn
▁" M wamb ie ▁Aroni ▁na ▁wana we , ▁' H ivi ▁ndivyo ▁mt aka vyo wa bar iki ▁Waisraeli . ▁Wa ambi eni : </s> swh_Latn
▁" ▁' ▁" B wana ▁aku bar iki ▁na ▁kuk ul inda ; </s> swh_Latn
▁Bwana ▁aku anga zie ▁nuru ▁ya ▁uso ▁wake ▁na ▁kuku fad hili ; </s> swh_Latn
▁Bwana ▁aku ge uz ie ▁uso ▁wake ▁na ▁kuku pa ▁amani . " ▁' </s> swh_Latn
▁" H ivyo ▁wata liw eka ▁Jina ▁langu ▁juu ▁ya ▁Waisraeli , ▁nami ▁nita wa bar iki . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Mose ▁ali pom aliza ▁ku isim am isha ▁Mas kani , ▁ali itia ▁mafuta ▁na ▁kui weka ▁wak fu ▁pamoja ▁na ▁sam ani ▁zake ▁zote . ▁Pia ▁ali tia ▁mad haba hu ▁mafuta ▁na ▁kui weka ▁wak fu , ▁pamoja ▁na ▁vyombo ▁vyake ▁vyote . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ndipo ▁viongozi ▁wa ▁Israeli , ▁wale ▁waku u ▁wa ▁jamaa ▁waliokuwa ▁viongozi ▁wa ▁kabila ▁was imami zi ▁wa ▁wale ▁wali oh esa biwa , ▁wak atoa ▁sadaka . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wali zi leta ▁kama ▁mat oleo ▁yao ▁mbele ▁za ▁Bwana : ▁magari ▁sita ▁ya ▁kuk okot wa ▁yaliyo fun ikwa , ▁pamoja ▁na ▁mak sai ▁kumi ▁na ▁wawili ; ▁yaani ▁mak sai ▁mmoja ▁kutoka ▁kwa ▁kila ▁ki ongozi , ▁na ▁gari ▁moja ▁la ▁kuk okot wa ▁kutoka ▁kwa ▁kila ▁viongozi ▁wawili . ▁Haya ▁wali ya leta ▁mbele ▁ya ▁Mas kani . </s> swh_Latn
▁Bwana ▁akam wambia ▁Mose , </s> swh_Latn
▁" V iku bali ▁vitu ▁hivi ▁kutoka ▁kwao , ▁ili ▁vi weze ▁kutum ika ▁katika ▁kazi ▁kwenye ▁H ema ▁la ▁Kuk utan ia . ▁W apat ie ▁Wala wi ▁kama ▁kazi ▁ya ▁kila ▁mtu ▁it aka vyo hitaji . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Hivyo ▁Mose ▁aka chukua ▁yale ▁magari ▁ya ▁kuk okot wa ▁pamoja ▁na ▁mak sai , ▁na ▁kuwa pa ▁Wala wi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ali wa pa ▁W ager sh oni ▁magari ▁mawili ▁ya ▁kuk okot wa ▁na ▁mak sai ▁wanne , ▁kama ▁wali vyo hitaji ▁kwa ▁kazi ▁yao , </s> swh_Latn
▁na ▁pia ▁aliwa pa ▁W amer ari ▁magari ▁manne ▁ya ▁kuk okot wa ▁na ▁mak sai ▁wan ane , ▁kama ▁kazi ▁yao ▁ilivyo hitaji . ▁Wote ▁walikuwa ▁chini ▁ya ▁ma eleke zo ▁ya ▁Ith amari ▁mwana ▁wa ▁ku hani , ▁Aroni . </s> swh_Latn

▁Mose ▁aka li onya ▁kus anyiko , ▁" S oge eni ▁nyuma ▁mbali ▁na ▁mah ema ▁ya ▁hawa ▁watu ▁wa ovu ! ▁M sig use ▁kitu ▁chochote ▁kilicho ▁mali ▁yao , ▁la ▁si vyo ▁m taf ag ili wa ▁mbali ▁kwa ▁sababu ▁ya ▁dhambi ▁zao ▁zote . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Hivyo ▁waka ondoka ▁karibu ▁na ▁mah ema ▁ya ▁Kora , ▁D athani ▁na ▁Ab iramu . ▁D athani ▁na ▁Ab iramu ▁walikuwa ▁wam et oka ▁nje , ▁nao ▁walikuwa ▁wam esim ama ▁pamoja ▁na ▁wake ▁zao , ▁watoto ▁wao ▁na ▁wale ▁wany onya o ▁kwenye ▁ml ango ▁wa ▁mah ema ▁yao . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ndipo ▁Mose ▁akasema , ▁" H ivi ▁ndivyo ▁mt aka vyo jua ▁kuwa ▁Bwana ▁amen ituma ▁kufanya ▁mambo ▁haya , ▁na ▁kwamba ▁ha likuwa ▁wazo ▁langu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ikiwa ▁watu ▁hawa ▁wat aku fa ▁kifo ▁cha ▁kawaida ▁na ▁kupat wa ▁na ▁yale ▁ya ▁kawaida ▁yanayo wa pata ▁wanadamu , ▁basi ▁Bwana ▁hak unit uma ▁mimi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁ikiwa ▁Bwana ▁ata leta ▁jambo ▁jip ya ▁kabisa , ▁ardhi ▁iki fun ua ▁kiny wa ▁chake ▁na ▁kuw ame za ▁wao , ▁pamoja ▁na ▁kila ▁kitu ▁kilicho ▁mali ▁yao , ▁nao ▁wash uke ▁chini ▁kabur ini ▁wakiwa ▁hai , ▁ndipo ▁mta fahamu ▁kuwa ▁watu ▁hawa ▁wam em dh arau ▁Bwana . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Mara ▁Mose ▁ali pom aliza ▁kusema ▁haya ▁yote , ▁ardhi ▁iliy okuwa ▁chini ▁yao ▁ik apas uka , </s> swh_Latn
▁nchi ▁ika fun ua ▁kiny wa ▁chake ▁na ▁kuw ame za ▁wao , ▁pamoja ▁na ▁jamaa ▁zao , ▁na ▁watu ▁wote ▁wa ▁Kora ▁na ▁mali ▁zao ▁zote . </s> swh_Latn
▁Wak ash uka ▁chini ▁kabur ini ▁wakiwa ▁hai , ▁pamoja ▁na ▁kila ▁kitu ▁wa lich okuwa ▁nacho ; ▁nchi ▁ika ji funika ▁juu ▁yao , ▁nao ▁waka ang amia ▁wak ato weka ▁kutoka ▁kus anyiko . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kut oka ▁ki lio ▁chao , ▁Waisraeli ▁wote ▁walio wa zung uka ▁walik imbia , ▁waki pa za ▁sauti , ▁" N chi ▁inat umeza ▁na ▁sisi ▁pia !" </s> swh_Latn
▁Moto ▁uka ja ▁kutoka ▁kwa ▁Bwana , ▁uka wat ekete za ▁wale ▁watu ▁250 ▁waliokuwa ▁waki f ukiza ▁uv umba . </s> swh_Latn
▁Bwana ▁akam wambia ▁Mose , </s> swh_Latn
▁" M wamb ie ▁Ele az ari ▁mwana ▁wa ▁ku hani ▁Aroni , ▁ato e ▁vy etezo ▁kwenye ▁mab aki ▁ya ▁moto ▁na ▁kuta wanya ▁maka a ▁mbali ▁kiasi , ▁kwa ▁maana ▁vy etezo ▁ni ▁vit akatifu : </s> swh_Latn
▁vy etezo ▁vya ▁watu ▁walio fanya ▁dhambi ▁iliyo wa ghar imu ▁maisha ▁yao . ▁F ua ▁vy etezo ▁hivyo ▁kuwa ▁bamba ▁ili ▁kufunika ▁mad haba hu , ▁kwa ▁maana ▁vim elet wa ▁mbele ▁za ▁Bwana ▁na ▁vim ekuwa ▁vit akatifu . ▁Na vyo ▁vi we ▁ishara ▁kwa ▁Waisraeli . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Hivyo ▁ku hani ▁Ele az ari ▁aka vik us anya ▁vile ▁vy etezo ▁vya ▁sha ba ▁vili vyo let wa ▁na ▁wale ▁waliokuwa ▁wam etek ete zwa ▁kwa ▁moto , ▁naye ▁aka vi fua ▁kufunika ▁mad haba hu , </s> swh_Latn
▁kama ▁vile ▁Bwana ▁ali vy omwe leke za ▁kupitia ▁Mose . ▁Hili ▁lilikuwa ▁kuwak umbusha ▁Waisraeli ▁kwamba ▁hakuna ▁mtu ▁hata ▁mmoja , ▁isipokuwa ▁m zao ▁wa ▁Aroni , ▁awe z aye ▁kuja ▁kuf ukiza ▁uv umba ▁mbele ▁za ▁Bwana , ▁la ▁si vyo , ▁ang ekuwa ▁kama ▁Kora ▁na ▁wafuasi ▁wake . </s> swh_Latn

" </s> swh_Latn

" </s> swh_Latn

▁M tach ukua ▁sehemu ▁ya ▁yale ▁mat oleo ▁mat akatifu ▁sana ▁ambayo ▁hay atek ete zwi ▁kwa ▁moto . ▁Kut oka ▁kwa ▁mat oleo ▁yote ▁wan ay onile tea ▁kama ▁sadaka ▁takatifu ▁sana , ▁ziwe ▁za ▁naf aka , ▁au ▁za ▁dhambi , ▁au ▁za ▁makosa , ▁sehemu ▁ile ▁itakuwa ▁yako ▁na ▁wanao . </s> swh_Latn
▁M ta ila ▁kama ▁kitu ▁kilicho ▁kit akatifu ▁sana ; ▁kila ▁mwana ume ▁ata ila . ▁Ni ▁lazima ▁mta ih esh imu ▁kama ▁takatifu . </s> swh_Latn
▁" H iki ▁pia ▁ni ▁chako : ▁chochote ▁kilich ot engwa ▁kutoka ▁kwenye ▁mat oleo ▁yote ▁ya ▁sadaka ▁za ▁ku inu liwa ▁za ▁Waisraeli . ▁Nin aku pa ▁wewe ▁haya , ▁wana ▁na ▁binti ▁zako ▁kama ▁sehemu ▁yenu ▁ya ▁kawaida . ▁Kila ▁mmoja ▁wa ▁nyumba ▁yako ▁ambaye ▁ni ▁safi ▁kwa ▁tar ati bu ▁za ▁ibada ▁anaweza ▁kuyala . </s> swh_Latn
▁" N inawa pa ▁mafuta ▁ya ▁ze it uni ▁yaliyo ▁bora ▁kuliko ▁yote , ▁na ▁di vai ▁mpya ▁iliyo ▁bora ▁kuliko ▁zote ▁na ▁naf aka ▁wana zom pa ▁Bwana ▁kama ▁ma limb uko ▁katika ▁mav uno ▁yao . </s> swh_Latn

▁" K ila ▁kitu ▁katika ▁Israeli ▁ambacho ▁kim eto lewa ▁kwa ▁Bwana ▁ni ▁ch enu . </s> swh_Latn

▁Ku an zia ▁sasa , ▁kamwe ▁Waisraeli ▁was is og ele e ▁karibu ▁na ▁H ema ▁la ▁Kuk utan ia , ▁la ▁si vyo ▁wata beba ▁matokeo ▁ya ▁dhambi ▁zao , ▁nao ▁wat aku fa . </s> swh_Latn
▁Ni ▁Wala wi ▁wataka of anya ▁kazi ▁katika ▁H ema ▁la ▁Kuk utan ia ▁na ▁kube ba ▁waji bu ▁wa ▁makosa ▁dhidi ▁yake . ▁Hili ▁ni ▁agi zo ▁la ▁kud umu ▁kwa ▁vi zazi ▁vi ja vyo . ▁Ha wat ap okea ▁ur ithi ▁wowote ▁miongoni ▁mwa ▁Waisraeli . </s> swh_Latn

▁Sad aka ▁yenu ▁ita h esa biwa ▁kwenu ▁kama ▁naf aka ▁kutoka ▁saka fu ▁ya ▁kup uria , ▁au ▁di vai ▁kutoka ▁kwenye ▁sh inik izo ▁la ▁kuk amu lia ▁zabi bu . </s> swh_Latn
▁Kwa ▁njia ▁hii , ▁ninyi ▁pia ▁mt atoa ▁sadaka ▁kwa ▁Bwana ▁kutoka ▁zaka ▁zote ▁mt aka zop okea ▁kutoka ▁kwa ▁Waisraeli . ▁Kut oka ▁kwenye ▁zaka ▁hizi , ▁ni ▁lazima ▁m toe ▁sehemu ▁ya ▁Bwana ▁kwa ▁Aroni , ▁ku hani . </s> swh_Latn

▁Pamo ja ▁na ▁kila ▁fa hali ▁kut akuwa ▁na ▁sadaka ▁ya ▁kiny waji ▁nusu ▁ya ▁hini ▁ya ▁di vai ; ▁pamoja ▁na ▁kila ▁kondo o ▁d ume , ▁th el uthi ▁moja ▁ya ▁hini , ▁na ▁pamoja ▁na ▁kila ▁mwana - k ondo o ▁robo ▁hini . ▁Hii ▁ni ▁sadaka ▁ya ▁kut ekete zwa ▁ya ▁kila ▁mwezi ▁it akay otolewa ▁kila ▁mwand amo ▁wa ▁mwezi ▁kwa ▁mwaka . </s> swh_Latn

▁" L akini ▁mk ish indwa ▁kufanya ▁hili , ▁mt akuwa ▁m nat enda ▁dhambi ▁dhidi ▁ya ▁Bwana ; ▁nanyi ▁ku weni ▁na ▁hakika ▁kuwa ▁dhambi ▁yenu ▁ita wa pata . </s> swh_Latn
▁J engeni ▁miji ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁wanawake ▁na ▁watoto ▁wenu , ▁na ▁mazi zi ▁kwa ▁ajili ▁ya ▁mbu zi ▁na ▁kondo o ▁zenu , ▁lakini ▁f anyeni ▁yale ▁mli yo ah idi . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Wag adi ▁na ▁Ware ub eni ▁wakam wambia ▁Mose , ▁" S isi ▁watumishi ▁wako ▁tu taf anya ▁kama ▁bwana ▁wetu ▁ana vy otu agiza . </s> swh_Latn
▁Watoto ▁na ▁wake ▁zetu , ▁mak undi ▁ya ▁mbu zi ▁na ▁kondo o , ▁na ▁mak undi ▁ya ▁ng ʼ ombe ▁zetu , ▁wata baki ▁hapa ▁katika ▁miji ▁ya ▁Gileadi . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁watumishi ▁wenu , ▁kila ▁mwana ume ▁aliye vaa ▁sila ha ▁za ▁vita , ▁wata vuka ▁ng ʼ ambo ▁kup igana ▁mbele ▁za ▁Bwana , ▁sawa ▁kama ▁bwana ▁wetu ▁ana vy osema . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Kisha ▁Mose ▁ak atoa ▁amri ▁kuhusu ▁wao ▁kwa ▁ku hani ▁Ele az ari , ▁na ▁Yoshua ▁mwana ▁wa ▁N uni ▁na ▁viongozi ▁wa ▁jamaa ▁za ▁maka bila ▁ya ▁Waisraeli . </s> swh_Latn
▁Mose ▁akawa ambia , ▁" I kiwa ▁Wag adi ▁na ▁Ware ub eni , ▁kila ▁mwana ume ▁aliye vaa ▁sila ha ▁za ▁vita , ▁ata vuka ▁Yord ani ▁pamoja ▁nanyi ▁mbele ▁za ▁Bwana , ▁basi ▁wakati ▁m tak apo ish inda ▁nchi ▁iliy oko ▁mbele ▁yenu , ▁wap eni ▁nchi ▁ya ▁Gileadi ▁kama ▁mil ki ▁yao . </s> swh_Latn
▁Lakini ▁kama ▁ha wata vuka ▁pamoja ▁nanyi ▁wakiwa ▁wame vaa ▁sila ha ▁za ▁vita , ▁lazima ▁waku bali ▁kup okea ▁mil ki ▁yao ▁pamoja ▁nanyi ▁katika ▁nchi ▁ya ▁Kana ani . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Wag adi ▁na ▁Ware ub eni ▁waka jibu , ▁" Wat umishi ▁wako ▁wata fanya ▁lile ▁Bwana ▁ali los ema . </s> swh_Latn
▁Tuta vuka ▁mbele ▁za ▁Bwana ▁kuingia ▁Kana ani ▁tuk iwa ▁tume vaa ▁sila ha ▁za ▁vita , ▁lakini ▁mali ▁tut akayo ir ithi ▁itakuwa ▁ng ʼ ambo ▁hii ▁ya ▁Yord ani . " </s> swh_Latn
▁Kisha ▁Mose ▁akawa pa ▁Wag adi , ▁Ware ub eni , ▁na ▁nusu ▁ya ▁kabila ▁la ▁Manase ▁mwana ▁wa ▁Yosefu ▁ufalme ▁wa ▁Sih oni ▁mfalme ▁wa ▁Wa am ori , ▁na ▁ufalme ▁wa ▁O gu ▁mfalme ▁wa ▁Bash ani , ▁nchi ▁yote ▁pamoja ▁na ▁miji ▁yake , ▁na ▁nchi ▁inayo wa zung uka . </s> swh_Latn
